description: Tequila and cannabis … what could go wrong?
title: Agave Margarita
ingredients:
◦ 1 oz cannabis leaf juice

◦ 25 mg cannabis tincture

◦ cannabis leaf, edible flowers, or greens of choice, to garnish

◦ 1 oz tequila

◦ 1 oz aquavit

◦ ¾ oz lime juice

◦ ¾ oz agave syrup

◦ 1 pinch sea salt
directions:
1. In a shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, aquavit, lime juice, agave syrup, green juice, salt, and cannabis tincture.

2. Shake, then fine strain into a lowball glass with one large ice cube.

3. Garnish with a cannabis leaf, edible flowers, or your favorite greens.

4. Serve immediately.

description: The perfect drink for any health nut!
title: Almond Milk
ingredients:
2 - 3 grams cannabis, ground

½ cup raw almonds

3 cups water, distilled
directions:
1. Blend almonds and water in a food processor until it resembles milk.

2. Strain the almond milk through a cheesecloth or strainer.

3. Add the strained milk to a saucepan and bring to a light boil.

4. Add the ground cannabis and reduce heat. Simmer for about 2 hours, stir frequently.

5. Remove from heat. Chill and serve.

description: An interesting twist on classic risotto. This recipe pairs great as a side dish with fish or chicken.
title: Apple Parmesan Risotto
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 2 tbsp butter

◦ 4 cups chicken or vegetable stock

◦ 4 oz pancetta or bacon, diced

◦ 1 onion small, white or yellow, chopped

◦ 2 tsp garlic, minced

◦ 1 ½ cups Arborio rice

◦ ⅓ cup vermouth or white wine dry

◦ 2 cups apple Granny Smith, peeled and diced

◦ ¼ cup fresh Italian parsley, minced

◦ 1 ¼ cups Parmesan cheese, grated

◦ ¼ tsp nutmeg, ground

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Place stock in a medium saucepan, bring to a boil, lower heat and keep warm.

2. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pancetta or bacon and cook until it starts to brown.

3. Add onions and garlic and sauté until softened, about 2 minutes.

4. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly, until starting to toast, about 2 minutes more.

5. Add vermouth or white wine and stir to deglaze the pan. Cook until most of the liquid has evaporated.

6. Stir in apples and parsley.

7. Lower heat to medium and begin adding the stock to the skillet, one ladle at a time.

(note) - Make sure to cook and stir between each addition, until almost all of the previous addition has evaporated before adding more. When all the stock has been incorporated, the rice should be creamy and tender.

8. Stir in nutmeg.

9. Remove from heat and stir in Parmesan, CannaButter, and butter until melted and well combined.

10. Cover and let sit for 5 minutes.

11. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stir and serve.

description: Grandma’s old fashioned recipe, with a contemporary twist.
title: Baked French Toast
ingredients:
3 tbsp CannaButter

1 French baguette

1½ tbsp butter

4 eggs

1 cup milk

¼ cup sugar

3 tbsp maple syrup

1 tsp vanilla extract

½ tsp salt

powdered sugar
directions:
1. Lightly butter a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Cut the baguette across into 8 even slices; each should be about ¾ inch thick.

2. Using a small bowl, cream both butters together until thoroughly combined.

3. Spread the combined butter onto a single side of each of the 8 slices and arrange each slice butter side up in the prepared baking dish.

4. Whisk together the eggs, sugar, milk, syrup, vanilla, and salt. Pour the mixture over the bread and press the slices down into it before covering the dish. Refrigerate for 8 hours.

5. When ready to cook, preheat your oven to 350°F.

6. Once the oven is heated, place the uncovered baking dish in the oven and bake for 45 minutes. 

7. Dust the finished French toast with powdered sugar and serve while hot.

description: This traditional Italian dish pairs great with your favorite wine. For an extra kick add some crushed red pepper!
title: Baked Italian Eggplant
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp cannabis-infused olive oil

◦ 2 cloves garlic, minced

◦ 1 large green bell pepper, sliced

◦ 1 medium yellow onion, chopped

◦ 5 Italian sausages (about 16 oz)

◦ 1 small carton mushrooms, sliced

◦ 1 tbsp Italian seasoning

◦ 1 tsp fennel seeds

◦ 1 (6 oz) can tomato paste

◦ ¼ cup red wine

◦ kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

◦ 2 large sprigs of fresh basil

◦ 2 ½ cups mozzarella cheese, shredded

◦ 1 large eggplant, sliced about ½-inch thick

◦ ¼ cup Parmesan cheese, shredded
directions:
1. Heat the cannabis-infused olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic, bell pepper, and onion and cook until soft, about 5 minutes.

2. Add the Italian sausages, and cook, turning as needed, until golden, about 8 minutes more. Then add the sliced mushrooms and sauté this mixture until the mushrooms reduce in volume, 5 more minutes. Add the Italian seasoning and fennel and cook 3 minutes more.

3. Add the tomato paste and cook 2 minutes. Add the red wine reduce for 2 minutes, then add 1½ cups water.

4. Stir this mixture on low on the stove top until well-combined, about 5 minutes. Let this mixture simmer on low for 45 minutes. After the 45 minutes are up, remove the Italian sausages, transfer to a serving platter, and keep warm. Season the sauce with salt and pepper.

5. Heat the oven to 375°F. Spread half of the sauce mixture and sprinkle half the mozzarella cheese onto the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Lay the sliced eggplant down evenly allowing for overlapping and season with salt and pepper, to taste.

6. Spoon the remaining sauce and sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese over the eggplant slices. Cover the baking dish with tinfoil. Bake for 55 minutes.

7. Remove the tinfoil and sprinkle the shredded Parmesan cheese over the dish. Bake for another 5 minutes, then remove the dish from the oven to serve. Garnish with fresh basil leaves.

description: Looking to get lifted while still eating healthy, then this is your dish.
title: Baked Lemon Chicken
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp CannaButter, melted

◦ 4 chicken breasts

◦ ⅓ cup chicken broth

◦ 4 tbsp fresh lemon juice

◦ 1 tbsp honey

◦ 2 tsp garlic, minced

◦ 1 tsp Italian seasoning

◦ salt and pepper, to taste

◦ fresh rosemary and lemon slices for garnish
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F and grease a baking sheet or large casserole dish.

2. Melt CannaButter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook chicken 2 - 3 minutes on each side just until browned. Transfer chicken to prepared baking sheet.

3. In a small bowl, whisk together chicken broth, lemon juice, honey, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.

4. Pour sauce over chicken. Bake 20 - 30 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Every 5 - 10 minutes spoon the sauce from the pan over the chicken.

5. Garnish with fresh rosemary and lemon slices, if desired, and serve.

description: Enjoy these sweet and fluffy muffins as a tasty treat or with some coffee. But be careful, their potency will creep up on you!
title: Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup CannaButter

◦ ¼ cup butter, melted

◦ 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour

◦ ½ cup granulated sugar

◦ 1 ½ tsp baking powder

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ 1 ¼ cup bananas, mashed (about 3 small bananas)

◦ 1 large egg

◦ ¼ cup milk

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 cup chocolate chips

◦ 2 tbsp coarse raw sugar
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Line twelve ⅓ cup muffin cups with paper or foil muffin liners. Or alternately grease and flour 12 muffin tin cups.

2. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in a small bowl, set aside.

3. In a large bowl, use a potato masher or the back of a large spoon to mash the ripe bananas.

4. Add egg, milk, melted CannaButter and butter to the mashed bananas and mix with a large spoon until all ingredients are well incorporated.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

5. Stir the dry ingredients into the bowl until combined, do not over mix.

6. Stir in chocolate chips.

7. Divide the mixture between the 12 muffin cups and sprinkle the tops with the coarse raw sugar.

8. Bake for about 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out without cake crumbs. Cool on a wire rack.

(note) - If you plan to freeze, cool completely before wrapping and labeling.

description: A sweet, healthy, and satisfying snack for any occasion.
title: Banana-Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
◦ 3 cups CannaFlour

◦ 1 ½ tsp baking powder

◦ 1 ½ tsp tsp baking soda

◦ 1 ½ tsp cinnamon, ground

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ 4 large eggs

◦ 2 medium ripe bananas, mashed

◦ 2 cups sugar

◦ 1 cup vegetable oil

◦ 1 ½ cups zucchini, shredded unpeeled

◦ 1 cup pecans, chopped
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. In a large bowl, whisk CannaFlour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon and salt.

3. In another bowl, whisk eggs, bananas, sugar and oil. Add to dry mixture and stir just until moistened. Fold in zucchini and pecans.

4. Pour batter into 2 greased 9 x 5 inch loaf pans. Bake until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, 45 - 50 minutes.

5. Cool in pans for 10 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely.

description: The perfect dish to combine your dream of breakfast and cannabis. Start your day off right.
title: Belgian Waffles
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ cups CannaMilk

(optional) 1 tbsp cannabis-infused maple syrup per waffle

◦ 1 ¾ cup all purpose flour

◦ 2 tsp baking powder

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 1 tbsp white sugar

◦ 3 large eggs

◦ 7 tbsp vegetable oil
directions:
1. Preheat your waffle iron before starting to mix the batter.

2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.

3. Make a well in the middle. Break the eggs into the well and beat lightly with a fork. Add the oil and CannaMilk and stir until moistened.

4. Using a spoon, put the batter into your waffle maker and cook until golden and crispy.

(optional) - Add cannabis-infused maple syrup.

description: Step up your morning breakfast routine with this quick, easy, and delicious recipe.
title: Blazing Breakfast Sandwiches
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

2 slices favorite bread

2 large eggs

2 slices bacon

2 slices favorite cheese
directions:
1. In a large frying pan, cook the bacon and then the eggs.

2. Spread 1 tbsp of CannaButter evenly across each slice of bread.

3. Assemble the sandwich in the following order: 1 slice of bread, 1 slice of cheese, 1 slice of bacon, scrambled eggs, 1 slice of bacon, 1 slice of cheese, and the other slice of bread.

4. Press the sandwich together and carefully fry it in the same large pan as before. 

(note) - Cook the sandwich on a medium-low heat, until all the cheese has melted.

description: This classic Bloody Mary recipe is the ideal way start off your Sunday.
title: Bloody Mary
ingredients:
◦ 2 oz CannaVodka

◦ 2 tbsp cannabis-infused bacon fat

◦ 32 oz tomato juice

◦ 1 tbsp horseradish

◦ 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce

◦ ¼ cup lemon juice

◦ 2 tbsp Sriracha

◦ 1 clove garlic, chopped

◦ 1 slice of bacon

◦ 1 celery stalk

◦ celery salt
directions:
1. Squeeze ¼ cup lemon juice. Add horseradish, Worcestershire and Sriracha.

2. Pour in 4 oz tomato juice. Add pinch of salt and pepper. Add 1 clove of finely chopped garlic. Stir in 2 oz cannabis-infused bacon fat.

3. Pour 2 oz of CannaVodka into an empty glass. Add ice cubes. Pour in Bloody Mary mix. Shake vigorously.

4. Rub lemon along the rim of a clean glass. Rub the rim in celery salt. Pour in finished Bloody Mary and garnish.

description: Start your morning off right with an amazing coffee cake! Compliment this recipe with a cannabis-infused coffee and a good book.
title: Blueberries & Cream Coffee Cake
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaButter

◦ 1 ¾ cups CannaFlour

◦ 2 cups sugar

◦ 2 large eggs

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ 1 cup sour cream

◦ 1 cup fresh blueberries

◦ ½ cup brown sugar, packed

◦ 1 tsp cinnamon, ground

◦ 1 tbsp powdered sugar

(optional) ½ cup pecans, chopped
directions:
1. In a large bowl, cream CannaButter and sugar until light and fluffy, 5 - 7 minutes. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Beat in vanilla. 

2. Combine the CannaFlour, baking powder and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, along with sour cream. Fold in blueberries.

(note) - When adding to the creamed mixture, alternate between adding some of the dry mixture and some of the sour cream. Make sure to beat well after each addition.

3. Spoon half of batter into a greased and floured 10-inch fluted tube pan or two 5-inch cake pans.

4. In a small bowl, combine the brown sugar and cinnamon.

(optional) - Add pecans to mixture in the small bowl.

5. Sprinkle half the mixture in the small bowl over the batter.

6. Top the sprinkled batter with the remaining batter.

7. Sprinkle the remaining brown sugar mixture across the top of the batter.

(note) - Cut through batter with a knife to swirl the brown sugar mixture.

8. Bake at 350°F until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean, 55 - 60 minutes.

9. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack to cool completely.

(optional) - Just before serving, dust with powdered sugar.

description: Enjoy the sweet flavor of blueberry with this classic southern recipe.
title: Blueberry Cobbler
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaButter, softened

◦ 2 ½ cups CannaFlour

◦ 1 ½ cups sugar

◦ 1 egg

◦ 2 tsp baking powder

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ ½ cup milk

◦ 2 cups fresh blueberries

◦ ½ tsp cinnamon, ground

(optional) whipped cream
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.

2. In a small bowl, cream CannaButter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg and beat well.

3. In another bowl, combine the CannaFlour, baking powder and salt. Add to creamed mixture alternately with milk, beating well after each addition. Fold in blueberries.

4. Spread into greased 9 x 9 inch baking pan.

5. In a small bowl, combine the sugar, flour and cinnamon. Cut in CannaButter until mixture is crumbly. Sprinkle over blueberry mixture.

6. Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 40 - 45 minutes.

7. Cool on a wire rack.

(optional) - Serve topped with whipped cream and additional blueberries.

description: Buttery cannabis-infused pretzel dough stuffed with creamy Brie cheese.
title: Brie-Stuffed Pretzel Bites
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 4 cups all-purpose flour

◦ 2 tbsp sugar

◦ 2 tsp instant yeast

◦ 1 ½ tsp salt

◦ 6 oz Brie

◦ 8 cups water

◦ ½ cup baking soda

◦ 1 egg
directions:
1. Fit an electric mixer with the dough hook attachment. In the mixer bowl, combine the flour with the sugar, yeast and salt for about 30 seconds.

2. Add 1 ¼ cups warm water and the melted CannaButter, and mix on low speed for 3 minutes.

3. Increase to medium speed and mix for 4 minutes more.

4. Transfer the dough to a lightly greased bowl and cover with plastic wrap. Let the dough rise until it has nearly doubled in size, about 1 -1 ½ hours.

5. Divide the dough into 40 even pieces. Divide the Brie into 40 pieces.

(note) - The Brie pieces should be small, about 1 tsp each.

6. Press each piece of dough flat and place a piece of Brie in the center. Roll the dough around the Brie and pinch well to seal on all sides.

7. Preheat the oven to 400°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.

8. Combine 8 cups water and baking soda in a large pot and heat over medium heat until the baking soda is fully dissolved.

9. Dip each pretzel bite into the baking-soda water for about 30 seconds. Transfer the pretzels to the prepared baking sheets, seam side down.

10. In a small bowl, whisk the egg with 1 tbsp water to combine. Brush the egg wash generously over each piece and then garnish with coarse salt.

11. Bake until the bites are golden brown, 15 - 20 minutes. Let cool at least 10 minutes and serve warm.

description: This recipe is great for large breakfast or brunch groups!
title: Broccoli Quiche with Kief
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

1 tbsp CannaButter, melted

1 onion, minced

1 tsp garlic, minced

2 cups fresh broccoli, chopped

1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust

1½ cups mozzarella cheese, shredded

4 eggs, well beaten

1½ cups milk

1 tsp salt

½ tsp black pepper

1 gram kief, decarboxylated
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. Over medium-low heat melt CannaButter in a large saucepan. Add onions, garlic and broccoli. 

3. Cook slowly, stirring occasionally until the vegetables are soft. Spoon vegetables into the pie crust and sprinkle with cheese.

4. Combine eggs, milk and kief. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in melted butter. Pour egg mixture over vegetables and cheese.

5. Bake in preheated oven for 30 - 50 minutes, or until center has set.

description: What is every football party missing - more cannabis! Spice up your next party and show everyone how to really enjoy the game.
title: Buffalo Wings
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 1 cup CannaMilk

◦ 32 oz oil (for frying)

◦ 1 cup all-purpose flour

◦ 2 tsp salt

◦ ½ tsp pepper

◦ ½ tsp cayenne pepper

◦ ¼ tsp garlic powder

◦ ½ tsp paprika

◦ 1 large egg

◦ 3 chicken breasts (skinless, boneless, & cut into ½ inch pieces)

◦ 4 tbsp hot sauce
directions:
1. Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375°F.

2. Combine flour, salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and paprika in a large bowl. 

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg and milk.

4. Dip each piece of chicken in the egg mixture, and then roll in the flour blend. Do this twice so that each piece of chicken is double-coated.

5. Refrigerate breaded chicken for 20 minutes.

6. Fry chicken in the hot oil. Cook until the exterior is golden brown, and the juices run clear, this should take around 5 - 6 minutes.

7. Combine hot sauce and butter in a small saucepan. Heat sauce on medium until melted. Pour sauce over the cooked chicken; mix to coat.

description: Crisp Romaine lettuce paired with homemade cannabis-infused caesar dressing. Spice this recipe up by adding some grilled chicken.
title: Caesar Salad
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ tbsp CannaOil

◦ 6 cloves garlic, minced

◦ ¾ cup mayonnaise

◦ ¼ anchovy can

◦ 6 tbsp Parmesan cheese, grated

◦ 1 tsp Dijon mustard

◦ 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce

◦ 1 tbsp lemon juice

◦ ¼ cup olive oil

◦ 4 cups bread, cubed

◦ 1 head Romaine lettuce, chopped

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Mince 3 cloves of garlic, and combine in a small bowl with mayonnaise, anchovies, 2 tbsp of the Parmesan cheese, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, and lemon juice.

2. Add the CannaOil to the mixture.

3. Season to taste with salt and black pepper. Refrigerate the cannabis-infused caesar dressing until ready to use.

4. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cut the remaining 3 cloves of garlic into quarters. Cook and stir until brown, and then remove garlic from pan.

5. Add bread cubes to the pan and cook, turning frequently, until lightly browned. Remove bread cubes from oil, and season with salt and pepper.

6. Place lettuce in a large bowl. Toss with dressing, remaining Parmesan cheese, and seasoned bread cubes.

7. Add cannabis-infused caesar dressing over the top of your salad.

8. Serve the salad immediately.

description: A little taste of Havana with a sweet sativa tone.
title: Café de Cannabis
ingredients:
1 gram sativa hash or kief, decarboxylated

1 cup of freshly brewed Cuban espresso

1 tbsp of sugar

2 pinches cinnamon, ground

2 pinches nutmeg, ground
directions:
1. After brewing a fresh cup of Cuban espresso, mix in the sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Stir until completely combined.

2. Mix in the decarboxylated cannabis until completely combined.

3. Add milk or enjoy dark. Serve immediately.

description: Start your next morning off right with a medicated omelet. Remember to spice it up with some cayenne peppers.
title: Cannabis Omelet
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter

2 large eggs

6 oz cooked ham, turkey, or bacon

8 oz grated cheese

½ medium onion

1 small tomato

(optional) cayenne peppers
directions:
1. Preheat stove at high-medium heat.

2. Grease a frying pan with CannaButter and place on element.

3. Beat eggs and add to pan.

4. While the eggs cook, dice the meat you selected.

5. Once the eggs has solidified on the bottom enough to flip without breaking, place all the filling ingredients in the center of the eggs. Flip one half of the omelet over to cover the fillings.

(optional) - Add diced cayenne peppers to spice omelet up!

6. Cook until fillings are cooked thoroughly.

(note) - Make sure all the cheese has melted.

description: Carrot cake just like grandma used to make. Enjoy this classic recipe with a tall glass of CannaMilk.
title: Canna Carrot Cake
ingredients:
◦ 2 ½ cups CannaFlour

◦ 1 cup cannabis cream cheese

◦ ¼ cup CannaButter

◦ 2 cups sugar

◦ 1 ½ cups canola oil

◦ 4 large eggs

◦ 2 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 ½ tsp baking soda

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 1 tsp cinnamon, ground

◦ 3 cups carrots, shredded

◦ 1 cup walnuts, chopped

◦ 3 cups powdered sugar
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease and flour a 10-inch fluted tube pan.

2. In a medium bowl, whisk together CannaFlour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.

3. In a large bowl, combine sugar, canola oil, eggs, and vanilla extract until well blended. Gradually combine dry mixture. Stir in carrots and walnuts.

4. Transfer to the prepared tube pan. Bake until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, 50 - 60 minutes.

5. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to completely cool.

6. For frosting, beat cannabis cream cheese and CannaButter until smooth. Gradually beat in powdered sugar. Spread over cake.

description: Savory garlic soup topped with cannabis-infused shiitake mushrooms.
title: Canna Mushroom Soup
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 1 oz of shiitake mushrooms, sliced

◦ 2 cups vegetable broth

◦ 2 cups heavy cream

◦ ½ onion, chopped

◦ 1 clove garlic, minced

◦ 1 tbsp olive oil

(optional) ½ tbsp of flour

◦ salt and pepper, to taste

◦ pinch coriander
directions:
1. Place the shiitake mushrooms with the CannaButter in a pan over medium heat. Cook until tender, and drain everything aside.

2. Sauté the onion in olive oil for 5 minutes over medium-high heat.

3. Add the garlic and heat for an extra 1 minute.

4. Add the vegetable broth and the cream. Bring to boil and stir thoroughly to combine all the ingredients.

(note) - To thicken the soup, add more flour.

5. After about 2 minutes, pour the soup into bowls and add the cannabis-infused mushrooms.

6. Finish by topping the soup with some salt, pepper, and coriander.

description: A special twist on an American classic. You have never enjoyed banana bread like this.
title: CannaBanana Bread
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaButter, melted

◦ 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour

◦ 1 cup white sugar

◦ ½ cup sour cream

◦ ½ cup walnuts, chopped

◦ 2 eggs

◦ 2 bananas, sliced

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 tsp baking soda

◦ ½ tsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F. Grease a 9 × 5 inch loaf pan.

2. In a large bowl, stir together the melted CannaButter and white sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, then add the vanilla, mix well.

3. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt, stir it into the CannaButter mixture until it's smooth. Lastly, fold in the sour cream, walnuts and sliced bananas. Spread evenly into the prepared loaf pan.

4. In the preheated oven, bake it at 350°F for about 60 minutes. You can use a toothpick that's inserted into the center of the loaf, when it comes out clean it's ready.

5. Cool loaf in the pan for about 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to allow it to cool completely.

description: The staple product for cooking most cannabis edibles. With CannaButter you can create some amazing special recipes.
title: CannaButter
ingredients:
◦ 6 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 16 oz unsalted butter
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. 

(note) - This baked cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Heat the butter in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the baked cannabis and cook, taking care not to let the temperature go over 200°F for about 45 minutes.

5. Remove from heat and let sit, undisturbed, for 10 minutes, before straining through a colander lined with cheesecloth, set over a bowl. Press carefully with a spoon to extract as much butter as possible.

(note) - The CannaButter will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 8 weeks.

description: These aren’t your grandma’s caramels…
title: CannaCaramels
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup CannaButter

◦ vegetable oil (for greasing pan and parchment)

◦ 1 cup heavy cream

◦ ¼ cup butter

◦ ¾ cup granulated sugar

◦ ¾ cup dark brown sugar

◦ ½ cup corn syrup

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 1 ½ cups pecans or walnuts toasted, chopped

◦ 1 ½ tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Lightly oil a 5 x 9 inch loaf pan, then line the bottom and at least halfway up the sides with parchment paper.

2. Place cream in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat, add CannaButter and regular butter, heat until butters are melted. Gently stir to combine well.

3. Stir in sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and salt until combined. Place lid on the pot and cook for 1 minute.

4. Remove lid and attach a candy thermometer to the pan. Cook without stirring until the mixture reaches 245°F then immediately remove from heat and quickly stir in nuts and vanilla. Pour mixture into the prepared pan.

5. Let stand until cool.

(note) - Place in fridge to speed up the cooling process.

6. Then use parchment paper to remove caramels from pan. Cut into 4 rows by 9 columns to make 36 individual candies.

description: Taste the flavor of Mexico with every sip of this amazing green cocktail.
title: CannaChapulin
ingredients:
◦ ½ oz CannaTequila

◦ ½ oz CannaMezcal

◦ ½ oz agave nectar

◦ ½ oz lime (or grapefruit) juice

◦ 1 oz cilantro

◦ 1 cup ice
directions:
1. Muddle the cilantro.

2. Add the agave nectar, juice, CannaTequila, and CannaMezcal. Muddle the mixture.

3. Add ice.

4. Shake, strain and garnish with a lime peel.

description: A staple for any cannabis connoisseur who is serious about baking edibles.
title: CannaCream
ingredients:
◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground

◦ 1 cup heavy cream

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 tbsp powdered sugar
directions:
1. Heat heavy cream and ground cannabis in double boiler over medium heat.

2. Simmer for at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally.

3. Remove the boiler from the heat and let the mixture cool.

4. Prepare a storage container by taking 2 sheets of the cheese cloth and securing it over the lid of the container.

5. Pour the cream slowly over the top of the cheesecloth and into the container.

6. After a few minutes pour the cream into an airtight container and store in the refrigerator until cold.

7. Serve and enjoy. Keep refrigerated.

description: Turn your next baking creation up to 1000! This infusion is perfect for those who have excess shake, stalks, and leaves.
title: CannaFlour
ingredients:
◦ 16 grams cannabis flowers, stalks, and leaves

◦ utilize parts of the plant that would usually be tossed out to decrease cost
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet. If you are adding stalks and leaves, try to separate them.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes (stirring every 10 minutes), taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn. 

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove the cannabis to cool.

4. Grind your cannabis in a food processor or blender until super fine.

5. Store in an airtight container in a dark, cool place.

description: With this quick and simple recipe you can make cannabis-infused gin and juice and reality.
title: CannaGin
ingredients:
◦ 750 mL bottle gin

◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 240ºF.

2. Decarboxylate your cannabis by spreading it evenly across a cookie sheet. Place aluminum foil over the top of the cannabis.

(note) - Break your cannabis up in to relatively small chucks to help the decarboxylation process.

3. Place tray into the oven for 25 - 45 minutes. Take it out and let it cool.

4. Grind the cannabis and wrap it in cheesecloth.

5. Place the cheesecloth package in a 1 L sealable jar, then add the gin.

6. Shake the bottle and let it sit, in the dark, for at least 48 hours. Shake it up at least once a day until it has reached your desired potency—up to one month, if possible.

(note) - The longer it sits, the more potent it will be.

7. Pour the gin mixture into a glass container, using a cheesecloth to strain out any ground cannabis from the gin.

(note) - Discard the plant material.

8. Store in 1 L sealable jar.

description: A classic condiment infused with the wonderful essence of the cannabis plant.
title: CannaMayo
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaOil

3 egg yolks

1 tsp lemon juice

½ tsp Dijon mustard

◦ pinch sea salt
directions:
1. Whisk egg yolk, lemon juice, salt, vinegar and mustard together.

2. Slowly add CannaOil while whisking.

3. Whisk until the mayonnaise begins to thicken.

(note) - Add a few drops of water if the mayonnaise mixture gets too thick.

4. Store mayonnaise in an airtight container. Chill in the refrigerator.

description: Not quite as crazy as tequila, this cannabis-infused alcohol will still have you in for a wild night.
title: CannaMezcal
ingredients:
◦ 750 mL bottle mezcal

◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 240ºF.

2. Decarboxylate your cannabis by spreading it evenly across a cookie sheet. Place aluminum foil over the top of the cannabis.

(note) - Break your cannabis up in to relatively small chucks to help the decarboxylation process.

3. Place tray into the oven for 25 - 45 minutes. Take it out and let it cool.

4. Grind the cannabis and wrap it in cheesecloth.

5. Place the cheesecloth package in a 1 L sealable jar, then add the mezcal.

6. Shake the bottle and let it sit, in the dark, for at least 48 hours. Shake it up at least once a day until it has reached your desired potency—up to one month, if possible.

(note) - The longer it sits, the more potent it will be.

7. Pour the mezcal mixture into a glass container, using a cheesecloth to strain out any ground cannabis from the mezcal.

(note) - Discard the plant material.

8. Store in 1 L sealable jar.

description: Perfect to pair with some cookies, pour into your morning cereal, or make a protein shake.
title: CannaMilk
ingredients:
◦ 6 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 2 cups whole milk or heavy cream
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. This baked cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Heat the milk in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the baked cannabis and cook, taking care not to let the temperature go over 200°F for about 45 minutes.

5. Remove from heat and let sit, undisturbed, for 10 minutes, before straining through a colander lined with cheesecloth, set over a bowl. Press carefully with a spoon to extract as much milk as possible.

(note) - The CannaMilk will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 8 weeks.

description: An essential utility for all serious cannabis connoisseurs.
title: CannaOil
ingredients:
◦ 6 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 2 cups oil (vegetable or canola)
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. This baked cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Heat the oil in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the baked cannabis and cook, taking care not to let the temperature go over 200°F for about 45 minutes.

5. Remove from heat and let sit, undisturbed, for 10 minutes, before straining through a colander lined with cheesecloth, set over a bowl. Press carefully with a spoon to extract as much oil as possible.

(note) - The CannaOil will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 8 weeks.

description: A sweet flavored adult beverage, with a strong whiskey flavor.
title: CannaSazerac
ingredients:
◦ 2 oz Weed Whiskey

◦ 1 sugar cube

◦ 2 dashes Peychauds Bitters

◦ ½ tsp water

(optional) lemon twist
directions:
1. Dose the sugar cube with bitters. Crush it into the bottom of the glass.

2. Add water.

3. In a mixing glass, stir the Weed Whiskey with ice and another dash of Peychauds. 

4. Strain into sugar.

(optional) - Add lemon twist.

description: The ideal infusion to be used on any of your next baking creations.
title: CannaSugar
ingredients:
◦ 3 grams cannabis, ground

◦ ½ cup high-proof alcohol (160+ proof)

◦ ½ cup granulated sugar
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. This baked cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Reduce the oven to 200°F.

5. Transfer the cannabis to a jar and cover with the alcohol. Screw the lid on tight and shake every 5 minutes for 20 minutes.

6. Strain through a cheesecloth set over a bowl, discarding solids.

7. Mix the alcohol with the CannaSugar and spread into an even layer in a glass 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Bake, stirring occasionally, until the alcohol has evaporated and the CannaSugar is lightly golden.

description: Hazelnut spread so good, you won’t be able to put it down!
title: CannaTella
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup CannaOil

◦ 1 cup hazelnuts

◦ 12 oz milk chocolate

◦ 3 tbsp powdered sugar

◦ 1 tbsp cocoa powder

◦ ½ tsp vanilla extract

◦ pinch of salt
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 350°F and bake the hazelnuts for 12 minutes.

2. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. In a separate mixing bowl, blend the toasted hazelnuts at high speed.

4. Add CannaOil, cocoa powder, powdered sugar, vanilla extract and salt to mixing bowl.

5. Blend again.

6. Now add your melted chocolate to mixing bowl and blend all together.

7. Sieve CannaTella through a colander lined with cheesecloth, into a bowl.

8. Jar and store

description: If you are looking to get crazy, this cannabis-infused tequila recipe will get you there.
title: CannaTequila
ingredients:
◦ 750 mL bottle tequila

◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 240ºF.

2. Decarboxylate your cannabis by spreading it evenly across a cookie sheet. Place aluminum foil over the top of the cannabis.

(note) - Break your cannabis up in to relatively small chucks to help the decarboxylation process.

3. Place tray into the oven for 25 - 45 minutes. Take it out and let it cool.

4. Grind the cannabis and wrap it in cheesecloth.

5. Place the cheesecloth package in a 1 L sealable jar, then add the tequila.

6. Shake the bottle and let it sit, in the dark, for at least 48 hours. Shake it up at least once a day until it has reached your desired potency—up to one month, if possible.

(note) - The longer it sits, the more potent it will be.

7. Pour the tequila mixture into a glass container, using a cheesecloth to strain out any ground cannabis from the tequila.

(note) - Discard the plant material.

8. Store in 1 L sealable jar.

description: For the connoisseur who appreciates their alcohol as much as their cannabis.
title: CannaTini
ingredients:
◦ 2 ½ oz CannaGin

(optional) cannabis Leaf

◦ ½ oz dry vermouth

◦ 1 dash orange bitters

◦ lemon twist
directions:
1. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass. Fill with ice.

2. Stir until thoroughly mixed and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

3. Garnish with a lemon twist and/or cannabis leaf.

description: A great cannabis-infused alcohol for almost any occasion. Enjoy this cannabis-infusion in cocktails or take shots.
title: CannaVodka
ingredients:
◦ 750 mL bottle vodka

◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 240ºF.

2. Decarboxylate your cannabis by spreading it evenly across a cookie sheet. Place aluminum foil over the top of the cannabis.

(note) - Break your cannabis up in to relatively small chucks to help the decarboxylation process.

3. Place tray into the oven for 25 - 45 minutes. Take it out and let it cool.

4. Grind the cannabis and wrap it in cheesecloth.

5. Place the cheesecloth package in a 1 L sealable jar, then add the vodka.

6. Shake the bottle and let it sit, in the dark, for at least 48 hours. Shake it up at least once a day until it has reached your desired potency—up to one month, if possible.

(note) - The longer it sits, the more potent it will be.

7. Pour the vodka mixture into a glass container, using a cheesecloth to strain out any ground cannabis from the vodka.

(note) - Discard the plant material.

8. Store in 1 L sealable jar.

description: Have you ever wondered what to do with any excess bacon fat? Use this unique recipe to utilize all the bacon each time your cook.
title: Cannabis-infused Bacon Fat
ingredients:
◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground

◦ 16 oz sliced bacon

◦ 1 tbsp sunflower lecithin
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 240°F.

2. Place medium sized cannabis chunks evenly on a cookie sheet. Cover with aluminum foil.

3. Let the cannabis decarboxylate for 40 minutes.

4. Begin cooking the bacon.

(note) - Strain the fat through a sieve into a mason jar.

5. Place the decarboxylated cannabis in the jar of bacon fat. Add the sunflower lecithin.

6. Fill a medium pot with cold water and place your sealed mason jar in it. Turn on the heat and let the cold water come to a simmer.

7. Let it simmer for 2 - 3 hours. Continue to fill water in the pan to replace any that evaporates.

8. After 2 - 3 hours, use cheesecloth to strain the plant material out of the bacon fat.

9. Discard the plant material and store the bacon fat in a refrigerator for later use.

description: You can’t go wrong with coconuts and cannabis. This healthy alternative can be used to replace most oils.
title: Cannabis-infused Coconut Oil
ingredients:
◦ ¼ - ½ oz cannabis, ground

◦ 1 cup coconut oil
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Place the cannabis in a strong mason jar, add coconut oil.

(optional) - Add 1 tsp of sunflower lecithin.

4. Place your closed jar in cold water, then let it come to a boil. (Boil for 2 - 3 hours.)

5. Strain through a cheesecloth.

6. Let it cool.

7. Now it’s time to enjoy the cannabis coconut oil.

description: A staple for anyone serious about cannabis edibles. Perfect for spreading on bread, using in baking recipes, or whatever else you can imagine.
title: Cannabis-infused Cream Cheese
ingredients:
◦ 1 oz cannabis, ground

◦ 16 cups milk

◦ 4 cups buttermilk

◦ ½ tsp salt
directions:
1. Pour milk and buttermilk into sauce pan. Stir ground cannabis into milk mixture. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally.

2. Heat mixture until the temperature reaches 170°F. Keep milk mixture between 170 - 175°F for 15 minutes.

3. Pour the mix through cheesecloth to remove the plant waste.

4. Return milk to pan and wait 15 minutes.

(note) - The mixture should start to separate.

5. Line a strainer with several layers of cheesecloth and set it inside a large bowl. Pour the mixture through the strainer to collect curds. Discard leftover milk.

6. Rest the curds on the strainer at room temperature for 2 - 4 hours. 

7. Remove curds from the cheese cloth and place in blender. Add salt and blend until creamy. Store in refrigerator for later use.

description: If bears knew about this version of honey, we would be in trouble …
title: Cannabis-infused Honey
ingredients:
◦ 3.5 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 1 cup of honey
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Every 10 minutes, gently mix the buds with a light shake of the tray to expose the surface area of the buds equally.

4. Combine the cannabis and honey in a double boiler to apply gentle heat on the stove top.

5. Simmer. Maintain low heat and let the mixture simmer for at least 40 minutes. The mixture should never come to a full boil.

6. Strain the honey. Set a funnel on top of a jar and line it with cheesecloth. Once the honey has cooled off, pour it over the cheesecloth funnel and allow it to strain freely.

(note) - Cannabis-infused honey can be stored in a cool dark area for 1 - 2 months.

description: If you enjoy the classic olive oil and vinegar, this will blow your mind!
title: Cannabis-infused Olive Oil
ingredients:
◦ ½ - 2 oz cannabis, ground

◦ 1 large mason jar

◦ 1 large pot of water

◦ 4 cups of olive oil

◦ ½ oz garlic or ginger
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. While your cannabis is baking, take a large pot of water and start to heat it. 

(note) - Put the mason jar cap on the bottom of the pot so your glass jar can rest on it. 

4. Peel and coarsely chop your garlic or ginger and place them in the jar. 

5. After baking the cannabis in the oven, add it to the jar. Pour olive oil into the jar, making sure to cover all of the product.

6. Place jar in the warm water for 1 - 2 hours at a medium low temperature, approximately 150 - 200°.

(note) - Use a cooking thermometer to make sure the desired temperature is reached.

7. After the cannabis and oil have been bound, strain CannaOil using cheesecloth over a strainer.

(note) - It's very important to keep these oils refrigerated or frozen after use! IF NOT REFRIGERATED OR FROZEN CORRECTLY THE GARLIC OR GINGER IN THE OLIVE OIL CAN PRODUCE BOTULISM!

description: A basic necessity for every bartending, cannabis enthusiast. Great for making quick cocktails with a cannabis kick.
title: Cannabis-infused Simple Syrup
ingredients:
4 grams cannabis, chopped

3 cups water

3 cups granulated sugar

3 tbsp vegetable glycerin
directions:
1. Bring the water to a low boil.

2. Slowly add the chopped cannabis, stirring frequently.

3. Next, add the sugar, stirring to dissolve.

4. Cook for 20 minutes, covered, not allowing the mixture to boil too vigorously.

(note) - If cannabis mixture gets to hot it will lose its potency.

5. Remove cover and add glycerin.

6. Continue cooking at a simmer, for 7 - 8 minutes, stirring constantly. The mixture will thicken.

7. Allow the syrup to cool.

8. To store the infusion, strain the syrup through a small strainer and cheese cloth into a storage container.

description: The ideal snack for movie night. Be careful, sweet and salty is a deadly combination.
title: Caramel Popcorn
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaButter

◦ 1 gallon popcorn, popped

◦ 1 cup brown sugar

◦ ½ cup corn syrup light

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ ½ tsp pepper

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ ½ tsp baking soda
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 250°F. Spray a large shallow roasting pan with cooking spray and add popcorn.

2. In a separate bowl mix brown sugar, corn syrup, CannaButter, and salt in a heavy saucepan.

3. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil over medium heat. Boil 5 minutes without stirring. Remove from heat. Stir in baking soda and vanilla; mix well.

4. Pour syrup over warm popcorn, stirring to coat evenly.

5. Bake for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.

(note) - Keep refrigerated for extended shelf life.

description: Ground chuck mixed with CannaButter on toasted buns, topped with your favorite vegetables and condiments.
title: Cheeseburger
ingredients:
◦ 6 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 32 oz chuck, ground

◦ 6 slices American cheese

◦ 6 burger buns

◦ salt and pepper, to taste

◦ tomatoes, sliced

◦ pickles, sliced

◦ onions, sliced

◦ lettuce

◦ burger sauce of your choice
directions:
1. In a large bowl, mix ground beef and CannaButter until just combined.

2. Divide into 6 portions and create nice round patties. Season the patties generously with salt and pepper.

3. Preheat the oven to 350°F.

4. Preheat your cast iron pan and sear the burger 1 minute per side. Do this with all 6 burgers and transfer to an oven tray.

(note) - Keep the remaining fat in the pan for the buns.

5. Finish the burgers in the oven until medium well.

6. Take your buns and cut them all in half. Place on an oven tray with the insides facing up. Take the remaining fat that was in the burger pan and brush the inside of your buns with it. Place buns in the oven on 350°F until nicely golden.

7. Take out your burger patties and place sliced cheese on them. Put back in the oven for 20 - 30 seconds, until the cheese has melted nicely.

8. Start building your burger with your choice of vegetables and sauce.

description: This great snack is perfect for those on the move. Pack a few of these tasty bars for a high energy snack to meet any occasion.
title: Cherry-Almond Granola Bars
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaButter

◦ ⅓ cup cannabis-infused honey

◦ 3 cups quick oats

◦ 1 ½ cups almonds, chopped

◦ 1 cup dried cherries

◦ 3 tbsp brown sugar

◦ 1 ½ cups almond butter

◦ ½ tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Line a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with parchment paper.

2. Melt the CannaButter in a large sauté pan over medium heat. Add the oats and toast until fragrant, 1 - 2 minutes.

3. In a large bowl, combine the oats with the remaining ingredients and mix well to combine.

4. Press the oat mixture evenly into the prepared pan. Place the pan in the refrigerator or freezer to let the mixture set for 5 - 10 minutes.

5. Cut into 12 evenly sized bars and serve.

(note) - The finished bars will keep, stored in an airtight container at room temperature, for up to a week.

description: Impress your friends and family with this delicious Mexican food recipe. Great for parties or small group gatherings.
title: Chicken Burrito Bowl
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp of CannaOil

◦ 1 cup CannaButter

◦ 3 cups of brown rice

◦ 1 cup black beans

◦ 1 can sweetcorn

◦ 16 oz chicken, sliced

◦ 1 ½ tsp of salt

◦ 2 tsp of cumin

◦ 2 tsp of paprika

◦ 2 medium red onion, sliced

◦ 1 cup of cheese, grated

◦ 1 cup white wine vinegar

◦ 1 tbsp sugar

◦ 4 avocados

◦ ½ cup of sour cream

◦ 1 tsp chili flakes

◦ 1 jalapeno pepper, minced

◦ 3 tsp of lemon juice

◦ 1 tbsp lime juice

◦ 4 small tomatoes, diced

◦ ½ cup hot sauce

◦ ½ tsp Worcestershire sauce

◦ 1 clove garlic, minced
directions:
1. Slice up the onion into thin strips, then add to a bowl with 1 cup boiling water, 1 cup white wine vinegar, and one tbsp of sugar. Leave for 30 minutes until the onion is pickled, then drain and dry on a cloth.

2. Cook the rice according to packet instructions. Add lemon juice and stir to combine.

3. Heat a small amount of vegetable oil in a large frying pan. Add the chicken and fry for 7 - 10 minutes, until cooked through. Add salt, paprika, cumin, and one tsp of lemon juice.

4. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside. Cover with foil to prevent it from drying out.

5. Add the sweetcorn and black beans to the pan and cook through until warm, adding a dash of lemon juice.

6. Make the pico de gallo next by combining: ½ medium red onion, jalapeño pepper, lime juice, and tomatoes in a bowl. Add seasoning to taste.

7. Make the guacamole by slicing up the avocados, removing the pits, then combining: sour cream, a pinch of salt, and chili flakes in a bowl.

8. Next, make the Tex Mex sauce. Heat the CannaOil in a small saucepan. Now, add it to a bowl with the hot sauce, CannaButter, Worcestershire sauce, and garlic. Stir well to combine.

9. Plate everything up separately. You should have a bowl each of pico de gallo, guacamole, cannabis-infused Tex Mex sauce, rice, chicken, black beans with sweetcorn, and pickled onions. Add another bowl for the grated cheese.

10. Serve buffet style to allow everyone to add what they want to their own bowls.

description: Turn your next Italian dinner into a night to remember … unless you have too much cannabis.
title: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaOil

◦ 1 jar of your choice of tomato pasta sauce

◦ 4 - 6 lb chicken breast, skinned and cleaned

◦ 1 pack of cremini or button mushrooms

◦ 1 medium-sized onion (red or white)

◦ rosemary to taste

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Add 1 - 2 tbsp of CannaOil to a large skillet on low heat. Let this oil heat up for a couple of minutes.

2. Open your pack of chicken breast and place pieces onto the hot skillet.

3. Dice the onion and slice the mushrooms, then place both into the skillet with the chicken. Cook the chicken, mushrooms and onion on medium heat for 10 - 15 minutes or until golden brown. Add a little salt and pepper to taste.

(note) - You can cover the pan with a lid to retain moisture.

4. While the chicken and veggies are roasting, in a small-medium saucepan empty your tomato sauce. Add the remainder of the CannaOil to the saucepan. Add finely chopped rosemary and salt and pepper to taste.

5. Stir this sauce and allow it to reach a light boil. Once hot and ready, place it off to the side.

6. Once the chicken is done cooking, pour the cannabis-infused tomato sauce over the chicken in the large skillet and mix with a spatula to get it evenly coated with sauce.

7. Serve immediately

description: The perfect munchie food is now an edible! Be careful, these quesadillas are addictive.
title: Chicken Quesadilla
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaOil

◦ 4 oz chicken breast, cooked

◦ 1 flour tortilla

◦ ½ cup cheddar cheese, grated

◦ ¼ cup black beans, cooked

◦ 1 tbsp onion, chopped

◦ 1 tbsp bell pepper, chopped

(optional) 1 tbsp jalapeños
directions:
1. Heat a medium skillet over medium heat. Warm your tortilla for about 30 seconds, flipping halfway. Flip once more, then sprinkle one-half of the tortilla with about ½ of the cheese.

2. Cover the cheese evenly with the remaining fillings: beans, bell pepper, onion, ½ tbsp CannaOil, chicken, and jalapeño (if using).

3. Sprinkle the remaining cheese over the fillings, and fold over the empty side of the tortilla to enclose the fillings.

4. Quickly brush the top of the quesadilla with light coating of remaining½ tbsp CannaOil, then carefully flip it with a spatula.

5. Let the quesadilla cook until golden and crispy on the bottom, about 1 minute.Then, flip it over once more and repeat.

(note) - Reduce the heat if necessary to prevent burning the tortilla.

6. Transfer the quesadilla to a chopping board and cut into pieces.

7. Serve immediately.

description: A snack like no other. This sweet and simple treat will be your next favorite.
title: Chocolate CannaBananas
ingredients:
◦ ½ tsp CannaOil or CannaButter

◦ ½ banana, sliced

◦ 1 tbsp dark chocolate chips
directions:
1. Combine CannaOil or CannaButter and chocolate chips in an oven safe bowl.

2. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. Stir cannabis-infused chocolate until smooth.

4. Add bananas, and coat well.

5. Place CannaBananas on parchment paper, dust with sprinkles if desired, and freeze.

6. Serve once cooled in refrigerator.

description: All chocolate lovers have to try this pie. Get medicated, while you indulge your chocolate cravings.
title: Chocolate Chess Pie
ingredients:
◦ 1 ¼ cups CannaFlour

◦ ¾ cups CannaButter

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ ¼ cup shortening

◦ 3 tbsp ice water

◦ 2 large eggs

◦ 1 cup brown sugar, packed

◦ ½ cup sugar

◦ 1 ½ oz unsweetened chocolate, melted and cooled

◦ 2 tbsp milk

◦ 1 tbsp all-purpose flour

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Combine CannaFlour and salt, then cut in ¼ cup CannaButter and shortening until crumbly. Gradually add ice water, tossing with a fork until dough holds together when pressed.

2. Shape dough into a disk. Wrap and refrigerate 1 hour or overnight.

3. Preheat oven to 425°F.

4. On a floured surface, roll dough to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Trim and flute edge. Refrigerate 30 minutes.

5. Bake on a lower oven rack until light golden brown, 15 - 20 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. Reduce oven setting to 325°F.

6. In a large bowl, whisk eggs, sugars, melted chocolate, milk, all-purpose flour and vanilla. Gradually whisk in the remaining ½ cup CannaButter. Pour into crust.

7. Bake at 325°F until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 35 - 40 minutes.

8.Remove foil. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate, covered, for 3 hours or until chilled.

description: The classic American dessert, which will have you coming back for more. Pair with CannaMilk for the ultimate treat.
title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaButter

◦ 3 cups all-purpose flour

◦ 2 cups chocolate chips

◦ 1 cup white sugar

◦ 1 cup brown sugar

◦ 2 eggs

◦ 2 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 2 tsp hot water

◦ 1 tsp baking soda

◦ ½ tsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. Cream CannaButter, white sugar and brown sugar together in a bowl, then beat in eggs. Stir in the vanilla.

3. Dissolve baking soda in hot water then add to mixture.

4. In a separate bowl, sift flour and salt; stir into butter mixture. Finally add the chocolate chips.

5. Get a baking tray & cover it in parchment paper. Place cookies with large spoonfuls of dough on the tray, evenly spaced apart. There should be about 24.

6. Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.

(note) - Slightly undercook for soft and gooey cookies.

description: You can’t go wrong with sweet and salty. The only this better is sweet, salty, and cannabis.
title: Chocolate Covered Pretzels
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup CannaButter

◦ 3 tbsp cocoa powder

◦ 3 tbsp powder sugar

◦ 1 bag pretzels
directions:
1. In a double boiler melt the CannaButter.

2. Once the CannaButter has melted, sieve in the cocoa powder & powder sugar.

3. Stir on low heat until the ingredients have completely mixed together. Mix thoroughly until there is consistency, then turn the heat off but leave the pot on the stove.

4. Place a pretzel in the cannabis chocolate mixture and push it below the surface with a fork to coat. Carefully remove, shake off any excess chocolate, and place onto a lined baking sheet.

5. Refrigerate the pretzels until the chocolate is hard, about 1 hour.

description: The cliche edible for every stoner. Enjoy the rich fudge flavors, while you get lifted.
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownies
ingredients:
◦ 5 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 5 tbsp unsalted butter

◦ 4 oz bittersweet chocolate

◦ 4 oz semi-sweet chocolate

◦ 2 large eggs

◦ 1 cup granulated sugar

◦ 2 tsp vanilla extract

◦ ¼ tsp kosher salt

◦ 1 cup cake flour, sifted
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F.

2. Grease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with regular butter and line with parchment paper. Grease parchment paper and set pan aside.

3. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

4. Combine the regular butter and CannaButter with the melted chocolate over a bain marie. Cook, stirring, until melted and smooth, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

5. Whisk the eggs together in a large bowl. Add the sugar, vanilla, and salt and whisk to combine. Stir in the chocolate mixture and fold in the flour.

6. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan and bake until the brownie forms a thin skin on top but the batter is still loose in the center, about 18 to 20 minutes.

7. Transfer the pan to a rack and let cool completely before slicing.

description: Taste the sweet flavors of honey and chocolate in this high energy snack.
title: Chocolate Granola
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaOil

◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ ½ cup honey

◦ 1 tsp pure vanilla extract

◦ ⅓ cup cocoa powder

◦ ¾ tsp salt

◦ 4 ½ cups oats

◦ 1 ½ cups almonds, chopped

◦ 2 cups chocolate chunks
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper, and grease the paper with nonstick cooking spray.

2. In a medium pot set over low heat, combine the CannaOil with the CannaButter, brown sugar, honey, vanilla, cocoa powder and salt.

(note) - Heat, stirring occasionally, until the mixture is smooth and fully combined.

3. In a large bowl, toss the oats with the almonds. Add the cocoa mixture and toss to combine.

4. Divide the mixture evenly between the two baking sheets and spread into an even layer. Bake until toasty and crisp, about 45 - 60 minutes. 

5. Remove the baking sheets from the oven every 20 minutes or so and toss the granola with a spatula to make sure it is toasting evenly.

6. Let cool to room temperature and then stir in the chocolate chunks.

7. Transfer the finished granola to airtight containers.

description: Cannabis-infused potato batter mixed with nuts and topped with homemade vanilla icing.
title: Chocolate Potato Cake
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ cups CannaButter, softened

◦ 2 cups CannaSugar

◦ 1 cup brown sugar, packed

◦ 2 cups powdered sugar

◦ 2 large eggs

◦ 1 cup cold mashed potatoes (without added milk and butter)

◦ 1 ½ tsp vanilla extract

◦ 2 cups all-purpose flour

◦ ½ cup baking cocoa

◦ 1 tsp baking soda

◦ 1 cup whole milk

◦ ¼ cup evaporated milk

◦ 1 cup walnuts or pecans, chopped
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. In a large bowl, cream CannaButter and CannaSugar until light and fluffy. Add 1 egg at a time, beating well after each addition. Add potatoes and vanilla. 

3. Combine the flour, cocoa and baking soda. Gradually add the mixture to the creamed mixture alternately with milk, beating well after each addition. Stir in nuts.

4. Pour into 2 greased and floured 9-inch round baking pans. Bake at 350°F until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 25 - 30 minutes. 

5. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks to cool completely.

6. In a saucepan over low heat, cook remaining CannaButter and brown sugar, until CannaButter is melted and mixture is smooth.

7. For the icing, stir in evaporated milk and bring to a boil. Remove from the heat; cool to room temperature. Stir in powdered sugar and vanilla until smooth.

8. Spread between layers and over top of cake and serve.

description: An easy way to spice up any dessert.
title: Chocolate Sauce
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup CannaButter

◦ 3 oz unsweetened chocolate

◦ ¼ cup butter

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ 1 ⅔ cup granulated sugar

◦ 6 oz evaporated milk

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

2. Combine the regular butter and CannaButter with the melted chocolate over a bain marie. Cook, stirring, until melted and smooth, about 5 minutes.

3. Stir in sugar, stirring to combine and incorporate before adding more. 

(note) - Slowly add more to avoid clumps.

4. Slowly stir in the evaporated milk, a little at a time, until everything is completely mixed. Continue to cook and stir until sugar has completely melted and sauce is smooth, about 3 minutes.

5. Use now for hot cannabis-infused chocolate sauce or cool completely and package in a lidded container and refrigerate. Microwave for about 10 seconds to reheat before using.

description: Fair food on an entirely different level.
title: Churros
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup cannabis coconut oil

◦ 1 cup all-purpose flour

◦ ½ tsp baking powder

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 2 tbsp sugar

◦ 1 cup water

◦ 32 oz oil (for frying)

◦ ½ tsp vanilla extract

◦ 3 tbsp cinnamon, ground

◦ 4 cups sugar
directions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, 2 tbsp of sugar and set aside.

2. Add the cannabis coconut oil along with 1 cup of water to a pan over medium heat, whisk constantly.

3. Once the water starts to boil, immediately pour it into the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar bowl. Blend this with an electric mixer until it's consistent. 

4. Add the vanilla extract and keep blending until the dough becomes smooth. Transfer the churro dough to a piping bag.

5. Pour the 32 oz of oil into a high-sided skillet over medium-high heat until it reaches 375°F. Squeeze out a 6-inch strip of churro dough directly into the oil and fry for about 2 minutes until the churros are golden brown.

6. Once the churros are cooked, remove them from the oil using tongs.

(note) - Place cooked churros onto a plate lined with paper towels to soak up excess oil.

7. Combine 4 cups of sugar and cinnamon in a large zip lock bag. set aside.

8. Once the churros are cooked, let them cool down. Add the churros to the bag and shake lightly allowing the churros to be completely coated in the cinnamon sugar.

description: A twist on a European classic that will have you wanting more than just one.
title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients:
◦ ¾ cup CannaMilk

◦ 2 ¼ tsp active yeast

◦ ¼ cup granulated sugar

◦ 1 egg yolk, room temperature

◦ ¾ cup CannaButter

◦ 3 cups bread flour

◦ ¾ tsp salt

◦ ⅓ cup brown sugar

◦ 1 ½ tbsp cinnamon, ground

◦ 4 oz cream cheese, softened

◦ ¾ cup powdered sugar

◦ ½ tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Add warm CannaMilk to the bowl of an electric mixer and sprinkle yeast on top.

(note) - You will know if the yeast has activated if it begins to foam after a few minutes. If it hasn’t, then start over; your CannaMilk was either too hot or too cold.

2. Once yeast begins to foam, add in sugar, egg, egg yolk and CannaButter. Mix until well combined. Next, stir in flour and salt with a wooden spoon until a dough begins to form.

3. Place dough hook on the mixer and knead the dough on medium speed for 8 minutes. The dough should form into a nice ball and be slightly sticky.

(note) - If you don’t want to use an electric mixer, you can use your hands to knead the dough for 8 - 10 minutes on a well-floured surface.

4. Transfer dough ball to a well-oiled bowl, cover with plastic wrap and a warm towel. Allow dough to rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size.

5. After the dough has doubled in size, transfer the dough to a well-floured surface and roll out into a 9 x 14 inch rectangle. Spread softened CannaButter over dough, leaving a ¼ inch margin at the far side of the dough.

6. In a small bowl, mix together brown sugar and cinnamon. Use your hands to sprinkle mixture over the buttered dough.

7. Tightly roll dough up, starting from the 9 inch side and place seam side down making sure to seal the edges of the dough as best you can.

8. Cut into 1 inch sections with a serrated knife or floss. You should get 9 large pieces.

9. Grease a 9 x 9 inch backing pan or round 9 inch cake pan. Line the pan with parchment paper to catch any filling that leaks out.

10. Place cinnamon rolls in the pan. Cover with plastic wrap and a warm towel and let rise again for 30 minutes.

11. Preheat oven to 350°F.

12. Remove plastic wrap and towel and bake cinnamon rolls for 20 - 25 minutes or until just slightly golden brown on the edges. 

(note) - Underbake the cinnamon rolls a little so they stay soft in the middle.

13. Allow them to cool for 5 minutes before frosting.

14. In the bowl of an electric mixer, combine cream cheese, CannaButter, powdered sugar and vanilla extract. Beat until smooth and fluffy. Spread over cinnamon rolls and serve immediately.

description: A simple, yet elegant dish for your next brunch. These delicious dairy desserts are sure to impress your friends!
title: Citrus Berry Trifles
ingredients:
6 tbsp CannaButter

1¼ cups all-purpose flour

1 tsp baking powder

¼ tsp baking soda

⅛ tsp salt

¾ cup granulated sugar

1½ tsp lemon extract

2 large eggs

½ cup plain yogurt

2 tbsp lemon juice

1 tsp lemon zest, grated

2 cups heavy cream

½ cup powdered sugar

2 cups blueberries, fresh

2 cups raspberries, fresh
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 

2. Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch baking sheet. In a small bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.

3. In large bowl with an electric mixer, cream CannaButter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, 1 at a time, then ½ tsp lemon extract, ½ tsp lemon zest, and yogurt. Lower mixer speed and mix in dry ingredients until just combined. Pour into greased half sheet pan and smooth out into one even layer.

(note) - Scrape edges and mix by hand to ensure batter is evenly mixed.

4. Bake for about 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Set aside to cool 30 minutes.

5. Prepare the lemon cream by whipping together the heavy cream, powdered sugar, and lemon extract until stiff peaks start to form. After you see the peaks begin to form, whip in the lemon zest.

6. To assemble the trifles, turn the container you will serving the dish in upside-down and press out the cookie with the top of the container. Continue with this cookie cutting until you create 20 circles from the baked cake.

5. Press 1 cake circle into the bottom of each of the 10 half-pint jars. Add a layer of fruit, followed by a layer of cream, then another cake circle, more berries, and more cream. Garnish with a few fresh berries on top and serve.

(note) - If making ahead, cover with jar lid and refrigerate until serving time.

description: Nothing beats the aroma of coffee and cannabis in the morning.
title: Coffee
ingredients:
◦ 1 gram cannabis, ground

◦ 1 tbsp coconut oil

◦ 2 cups coffee, brewed
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 245°F.

2. Grind the cannabis, put it into a small oven-safe bowl and add the coconut oil. Cover the bowl with foil and place it in the oven for 20 minutes.

3. Remove the bowl from the oven and strain the oil with cheesecloth to rid it of plant matter. 

4. Add the cannabis coconut oil to the coffee and serve with cannabis-infused coffee creamer to taste.

description: Cookies, cheesecake, and cannabis … can it get any better?
title: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 1 tbsp butter

◦ 24 of your favorite cookies

◦ divide 3 (8 oz) Philadelphia cream cheese packets

◦ ¾ cup sugar

◦ 1 tsp vanilla

◦ 3 eggs
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 330°F.

2. Place 16 of the cookies in resealable plastic bag. Flatten bag to remove excess air, then seal bag. Crush cookies by rolling a rolling pin across the bag. 

3. Place crushed cookies in a medium bowl. Add regular butter and CannaButter, mix well. Press firmly onto bottom of 9 inch springform pan.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

4. Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating just until blended.

5. Chop or crush remaining 8 cookies. Gently stir half of the chopped cookies into cream cheese batter. Pour batter over prepared crust. Sprinkle top of batter with the remaining cookies.

6. Bake 45 minutes or until center is almost set. Let cool. Refrigerate overnight.

description: The perfect bitesized snack from your childhood made to meed your adult standards.
title: Doughnut Holes
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter, melted

◦ 2 tbsp unsalted butter, melted

◦ 3 cups bread flour

◦ 1 cup granulated sugar

◦ 4 ½ tsp baking powder

◦ 1 tsp kosher salt

◦ 1 cup whole milk

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 large egg

◦ canola oil (for frying)
directions:
1. In a medium bowl, mix the flour, ¼ cup sugar, baking powder, and salt. 

2. In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment, combine milk, CannaButter, regular butter, vanilla, and egg. Add in the dry ingredients and mix until a sticky dough forms.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

3. Heat 4-inches oil in a 1 ½ gallon saucepan until a deep-fry thermometer reads 350°F.

4. Working in batches, roll about ½ oz batter into a loose, sticky ball; carefully slide into oil and fry, turning often, until puffed and golden, 2 - 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer doughnut holes to a baking sheet with a wire rack.

5. Repeat with remaining dough.

6. Let doughnuts cool completely before tossing in remaining sugar to coat.

description: What is more iconic than coffee and doughnuts? Coffee, cannabis, and doughnuts!
title: Doughnuts
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaButter, melted

◦ 1 tbsp unsalted butter, melted

◦ 2 cups flour

◦ ¾ cup granulated sugar

◦ 2 tsp baking powder

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 2 eggs, lightly beaten

◦ 1 cup whole milk

◦ 2 tsp vanilla extract

◦ ½ cup granulated sugar

◦ 2 tbsp cinnamon

◦ ½ cup powdered sugar

◦ ½ tsp vanilla extract

◦ ½ tbsp milk

◦ pinch salt
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F and lightly grease your doughnuts pans.

2. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.

3. In a separate bowl, combine, eggs, milk, CannaButter, regular butter, and vanilla extract.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and mix until just combined.

5. Fill doughnuts pan ¾ full (about 3 tbsp each), and spread the batter into an even layer.

6. Bake for 15 - 17 minutes.

(note) - The doughnuts are ready when a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

7. To release doughnuts from the pan, let them cool slightly, turn pan over and beat it gently on the table.

Powdered Sugar Doughnuts — add about ⅓ cup of powdered sugar into a paper lunch bag. Toss doughnuts in the bag one at a time until they are coated evenly with powdered sugar.

Cinnamon Sugar Doughnuts — melt 2 tbsp CannaButter and 2 tbsp of unsalted butter in a small bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together your cinnamon and sugar. Dip both sides of the doughnuts in the butter and then both sides in the cinnamon sugar.

Glazed Doughnuts — whisk together 2 cups powered sugar, ¼ cup milk and 1 tsp vanilla extract, until smooth. Set doughnuts on cooling rack and drizzle glaze over with a spoon.

description: Enjoy this creamy classic with a pairing of your favorite wine.
title: Fettuccine Alfredo Pasta
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaButter

◦ 24 oz dry fettuccine pasta

◦ 15 oz heavy cream

◦ ¾ cup Romano cheese, grated

◦ ½ cup Parmesan cheese, grated

◦ 1 dash garlic salt

◦ salt & pepper, to taste
directions:
1. With the large pot, bring lightly salted water to a boil. Then add the dry pasta and cook for 8 - 10 minutes or until ready, drain the pot.

2. In a large saucepan, melt the CannaButter and cream on low heat. Then add your salt, pepper and garlic salt.

3. Stir in the cheese over medium heat until it’s melted.

4. Finally, add the pasta to the sauce. Make sure to use all the sauce and ensure the pasta is entirely coated.

description: Tasty fish covered in a cannabis-infused batter with homemade wedge cut french fries.
title: Fish & Chips
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup of CannaMilk

◦ 8 oz white fish fillets, skinned and deboned

◦ 1 cup flour

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ 1 tsp pepper

◦ 1 large egg

◦ oil, for deep frying

◦ 32 oz potatoes

◦ salt, to taste
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350˚F.

2. Peel the potatoes and then cut them into desired french fry shape. Place the fries in a bowl of lightly salted water and set aside.

3. Mix ½ a tsp of salt and 1 tsp of pepper together and rub it on both sides of the fish fillet to remove moisture.

4. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper in a mixing bowl, and stir together. Add in the CannaMilk and egg and whisk until the mixture is stiff and smooth.

(note) - You may need to let it stand for up to 20 minutes.

5. Pour the oil into a large pan or deep fat fryer and heat it to 375˚F.

6. Cover the fish in the batter and fry in the oil until it is golden brown. Then, take out the fillets and place them on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.

7. Place in the oven for a few minutes to finish cooking while you make the fries.

8. Drain the potatoes and dry them on a piece of kitchen paper. Then, fry in the same oil you cooked the fish in at 350˚F.

9. Drain the fries on kitchen paper again, then season with salt. Take the fish out of the oven and serve.

description: The most classy way to consume you cannabis and alcohol.
title: French 75
ingredients:
◦ 1 oz CannaGin

◦ 1 oz simple syrup

◦ 1 oz lemon juice

◦ 4–5 oz Champagne or sparkling wine
directions:
1. Combine first three ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake hard for ten seconds and strain into a champagne flute.

2. Top with a few ounces of Champagne or sparkling wine and garnish with a lemon twist.

description: Satisfy your cannabis cravings and munchies all in one snack.
title: French Fries
ingredients:
◦ ⅔ cup CannaOil

◦ 4 large potatoes, peeled

◦ 3 tbsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.

2. Cut the peeled potatoes into strips (into desired shape) and spread them evenly on the baking sheet.

3. Drizzle the CannaOil over them and season with salt. Try to coat each fry relatively evenly with the oil so that there is a consistent potency.

4. Cook the fries until they are golden brown. Around 15 - 20 minutes.

5. Allow the fries to cool down, around 5 minutes.

6. Divide the fries into equal proportions and serve.

description: For those chocolate lovers out there, this is a must have! Serve with some CannaMilk for the perfect snack.
title: Fudge
ingredients:
◦ ¼ cup CannaButter

◦ 3 cups semisweet chocolate chips

◦ 14 oz sweetened condensed milk

(optional) 8 oz marshmallow
directions:
1. Spray 8 x 8 inch baking pan lightly with cooking oil.

2. Put all ingredients into a microwave safe mixing bowl. Cook on high for 5 minutes, stopping to stir once or twice. Stir well. 

3. Pour mixture into prepared pan.

4. Once the fudge has cooled, cut it into 24 equal sized pieces.

description: Why grill regular chicken when you can infuse it with cannabis!
title: Ganja Jerk Chicken
ingredients:
½ cup CannaOil

½ cup cannabis-infused honey

2 lb chicken

8 tbsp jerk chicken marinade
directions:
1. Preheat grill to 350 - 400ºF.

(note) - Make sure the temperature does NOT exceed 400ºF. If the temperature goes over 400ºF, the cannabis will vaporize and you will no longer have infused chicken.

2. In a large bowl, mix the jerk chicken marinade, CannaOil, and cannabis-infused honey. Add each piece of chicken to the bowl, completely covering the chicken with the marinade and set aside. 

3. Now grill chicken until any liquid coming out of the chicken is clear.

description: A simple, yet tasty twist on an Italian dish everyone loves.
title: Garlic Parmesan Pasta
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 2 tbsp unsalted butter

◦ 16 oz angel hair pasta

◦ salt and pepper, to taste

◦ 7 garlic cloves, roughly chopped

◦ ¾ cup Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until light brown, 3 - 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside.

2. Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes. Drain it, reserving ½ cup pasta water.

3. Return the pasta to the pot you cooked it in and add the garlic, butter, salt, and pepper.

4. With a large fork and spoon combine the ingredients well, then add a ½ cup of the grated Parmesan cheese and the pasta water and continue to combine gently.

5. Transfer the pasta to a large platter and top it with the remaining Parmesan.

description: For those with a sweet tooth, this cake will satisfy your every craving.
title: Gingerbread Cake with Caramel Sauce
ingredients:
◦ 9 tbsp CannaButter, softened

◦ ¼ tbsp butter, cubed

◦ 1 cup molasses

◦ ⅓ cup sugar

◦ 1 large egg

◦ 2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour

◦ 1 tsp baking soda

◦ 1 tsp ginger, ground

◦ 1 tsp cinnamon, ground

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ 1 ¾ cups water

◦ 1 cup brown sugar, packed

◦ 1 tbsp cornstarch

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

(optional) whipped cream
directions:
1. In a large bowl, cream CannaButter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in molasses and egg until well blended.

2. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon and salt. Add this mixture to the creamed mixture alternately with ¾ cup water.

3. Transfer to a greased 9 x 9 inch baking pan. Bake at 325°F for 35 - 40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

4. Once the toothpick comes out clean, place the cake on a wire rack to cool for about 10 minutes.

5. For caramel sauce, in a small saucepan, combine brown sugar and cornstarch. Stir in 1 cup cold water until smooth. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.

6. Remove from the heat; stir in ¼ regular butter and vanilla until smooth. Serve with warm cake.

(optional) - Top cake with whipped cream.

description: This dish is great during the winter holidays. Pairs nicely with some Café de Cannabis.
title: Gingerbread Mini Cakes
ingredients:
1 tbsp cannabis, ground

2 tbsp cannabis-infused coconut oil

1 cup hemp milk

½ cup baking flour

¼ cup brown rice flour

¼ cup raw coconut flour

2 tsp baking powder

½ tsp sea salt

1 tbsp powdered ginger

¼ cup water

1 flax egg

2 tbsp black strap molasses
directions:
1. In a medium size bowl, combine flax egg, water, hemp milk, molasses, and melted cannabis-infused coconut oil.

(note) - To make a flax egg, mix 1 tbsp ground flax seeds + 3 tbsp water in a small bowl. Allow mixture to thicken in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes before use.

2. Gradually add the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients and stir until well combined. 

(note) - The batter should be slightly runny.

3. Grease a griddle or pan with some cooking oil and warm up over medium heat to melt oil.

5. Reduce heat to medium-low and scoop the batter unto the griddle using approximately one tbsp of batter for each mini cake. 

6. Let cook on one side until edges are bubbly and firm (about 3-5 minutes), flip and repeat until brown on the other side.

7. Serve hot!

description: For those chefs are a bit more ambitious with their edibles dishes. A great way to impress your friends and family.
title: Gnocchi in CannaButter
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 3 large baking potatoes

◦ 1 tbsp olive oil

◦ 1 large egg, slightly beaten

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ 3 cups of all-purpose flour (add more if needed)

◦ 3 cloves garlic

◦ salt, to taste

(optional) grated Parmesan, Asiago, or Romano cheese
directions:
1. Boil potatoes (skins on) in salted water until done. While hot, remove skins, then put potatoes through a sieve to insure no lumps.

2. Using a large wooden spoon, combine potatoes, egg, and baking powder until fairly well mixed together.

3. Flour a board, then mix and kneed the potato/flour mixture until it resembles bread dough.

4. Roll out a portion of dough to the width and length of a cigar and cut into 1in bits.
