5. Place a fork upside down then roll the uncut side of the dough pieces over the fork. Roll one piece of dough at a time and cover the remaining portion to keep them from getting dry.

(note) - This is to add some small ridges to one side of the gnocchi.

6. Cook one or two pieces for about 4 minutes. Remove and taste them. They should be firm but not too hard.

7. When you have finished cutting all the pieces, place them on a floured board or cookie sheet and sprinkle lightly with flour.

(note) - These can be covered with a dish towel for use the same day or frozen on the cookie sheet, then placed in a plastic bag for future use.

8. If you are going to use them right away, boil some salted water in a large pot adding a tbsp of olive oil. Add the pieces of gnocchi. When they rise to the top of the water, cook for about five minutes. Gently pour into a large sieve or colander.

9. While still in the colander, rinse gnocchi under hot water to remove the flour you topped them with. This will keep them from sticking when you add the melted CannaButter and garlic mixture.

10. Heat a saucepan to medium heat and add a little coconut oil or olive oil with the CannaButter. Now add chopped garlic, browning lightly. 

11. Slowly pour over the boiled gnocchi.

(optional) - Sprinkle well with grated Parmesan, Asiago, or Romano cheeses and add your favorite red sauce on the gnocchi after pouring the butter/garlic.

description: These tasty golden bites are satisfying and quite healthy. Receive turmeric’s anti-inflammatory benefits with each bite.
title: Golden Milk Snack Bites
ingredients:
◦ ⅓ cup CannaFlour

◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ ½ cup unsalted cashew butter

◦ 2 - 3 tbsp maple syrup

◦ 2 tbsp hemp seeds

◦ 1 tbsp golden milk mix

◦ pinch sea salt
directions:
1. Add cashew butter to a medium mixing bowl along with maple syrup, hemp seeds, golden milk mix, and salt. Stir to combine.

2. Add CannaFlour a little at a time until a firm cookie dough consistency is reached.

(note) - Consistency should be not be tacky, crumbly, and should be moldable into balls.

3. Taste and adjust flavor as needed, adding more golden milk mix for more spice, or maple syrup for increased sweetness.

4. Add the softened CannaButter and stir it loosely into the dough.

5. Scoop out 1 tbsp amounts and gently roll into balls. Repeat until all dough is formed into all 12 balls.

(optional) - Roll in shredded coconut.

6. Refrigerate for 10 - 15 minutes to chill.

7. After chilling, top with melted CannaButter, then chill again for about 10 minutes.

(note) - The finished bites will keep stored in the refrigerator up to 1 week or in the freezer 1 month.

description: Classic yeast rolls, just like grandma used to bake, taken to the next level with its cannabis-infused batter.
title: Grandma’s Yeast Rolls
ingredients:
◦ 2 cups CannaFlour

◦ 1 ½ - 2 cups flour

◦ ¼ oz active dry yeast

◦ 1 cup milk

◦ ¼ cup sugar

◦ ¼ cup unsweetened applesauce

◦ 2 large egg white

◦ 1 tsp salt
directions:
1. In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm milk (110 - 115°F). Add the sugar, applesauce, egg whites, salt and 2 cups CannaFlour; beat until smooth. Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough.

2. Turn onto a lightly floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, 6 - 8 minutes. Place in a bowl coated with cooking spray, turning once to coat top. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.

3. Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface; divide into 24 pieces. Shape each portion into an 8-inch rope and tie into a knot. Place on 2 baking sheets coated with cooking spray.

4. Preheat oven to 375°F. 

5. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 30 minutes.

6. Bake rolls until golden brown, 12 - 16 minutes. Remove from pans to wire racks to cool.

description: Fresh green beans, mushrooms, and onion topped with french fried onions. This casserole works great as a side dish.
title: Green Bean Casserole
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 1 tbsp butter

◦ 3 cups fresh green beans, halved

◦ ½ cup onion yellow or white, diced

◦ 1 cup mushrooms, sliced

◦ 1 (13 oz) can cream of mushroom soup

◦ 1 ½ cups french fried onions

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Butter an 8 x 8 inch baking pan.

2. Heat a large pot of water to boiling over high heat. Add beans and cook for 3 - 4 minutes. Drain beans and set aside.

(note) - Beans should still be semi-crispy.

3. Melt the CannaButter and butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and mushrooms and cook. Stir until softened, about 5 minutes.

4. Remove from heat and add the drained beans, cream of mushroom soup, ¾ cup of the french fried onions and salt and pepper.

5. Stir to combine and pour mixture into the prepared baking pan.

6. Top with remaining fried onions ad bake for about 20 minutes or until heated though and beans are tender.

description: If you are looking for the best way to enjoy cannabis and alcohol, you have found it! Just add this to any of your favorite drinks and prepare for a wild night.
title: Green Dragon
ingredients:
◦ 3.5 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 25 oz vodka

◦ 34 oz heat-tolerant whipped cream whipper

◦ 2 nitrous oxide chargers
directions:
1. Pour 8 - 9 oz vodka into the whipper. Add the cannabis into the whipper.

(note) - If you use ⅓ of a bottle of vodka, then weigh out ⅓ of an eighth of cannabis.

2. Attach the nitrous charger to the whipper and then release the gas. Unscrew the charger and attach the second charge and release the gas again. After the second charge, let it sit for a minute or two and then open it up.

3. Next, take out your double boiler. Heat the water in the lower part of the double boiler to around 200°F. Pour the infused alcohol into the top of the double boiler.

4. Simmer the alcohol at this temperature in the top of the double boiler for about 45 minutes.

(note)- This will reduce the mixture a bit, so add vodka to match whatever volume is lost in order to maintain the original volume.

5. Next, remove the top pot from the double boiler and set aside.

6. Using a glass-measuring cup, put a small metal strainer on top and then set some cheesecloth into the strainer. Pour the cannabis liquid into the glass-measuring cup and strain out the leftover cannabis.

7. After straining, add enough of vodka to bring it back to the original volume (250 ml).

8. Now you can use this liquid, Green Dragon, as a substitute for the base spirit in your favorite cocktail.

description: Warm crunchy bread topped with creamy Brie cheese and a sweet strawberry mixture.
title: Grilled Cheese Crostini
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaOil

◦ ⅓ cup CannaOil, for brushing

◦ 2 cups strawberries, sliced

◦ 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar

◦ pinch of sugar

◦ 1 loaf crusty bread, thickly sliced

◦ 10 oz Brie cheese

◦ 4 tbsp fresh mint, capped

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Preheat the grill.

2. In a large bowl, toss the strawberries with 2 tbsp of the CannaOil, the balsamic vinegar, sugar and salt to combine. Set aside to macerate for 15 - 20 minutes.

3. Once the grill is hot, brush each piece of bread generously on both sides with the remaining CannaOil.

4. Grill the bread until nicely charred on both sides, about 2 - 3 minutes. Let cool slightly.

5. To serve, top each piece of bread with 3 tbsp of Brie and 2 - 3 tbsp of the strawberry mixture.

6. Finish with a sprinkle of mint and pinch of black pepper.

7. Serve immediately.

description: The perfect picnic dish for the next adult gathering. Quick, tasty, and easy; what’s not to love?
title: Grilled Corn on the Cob with CannaButter
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

4 ears of corn

¼ tbsp sea salt

¼ tbsp black pepper, ground

(optional) cannabis leaves, chopped

(optional) hot sauce

(optional) garlic powder

(optional) chili powder
directions:
1. Preheat grill to 350°F.

2. Peel husks from the corn and remove any excess strings remaining from the husks.

3. Grill the prepared corn.

(note) - Turn the corn often so each ear of corn is evenly charred. 

4. Remove the corn from the grill and slather each ear of corn with CannaButter. After evenly distributing the CannaButter, add your desired seasonings.

description: Delicate mahi-mahi topped with cannabis-infused chili salsa, sliced avocado, and crumbled queso fresco.
title: Grilled Fish Tacos
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaOil

◦ 1 Anaheim chili, large

◦ 1 jalapeño pepper

◦ 1 tomatillo pepper, medium

◦ ½ white onion, small

◦ ½ tsp garlic, minced

◦ ⅓ cup cilantro, minced

◦ lime juice

◦ 1 pound mahi-mahi

◦ 1 tsp vegetable oil

◦ salt and pepper, to taste

◦ 4 large corn tortillas

◦ 1 cup green cabbage, shredded

◦ 1 avocado medium, sliced

◦ ⅓ cup queso fresco, crumbled
directions:
1. In a medium pan, cook Anaheim chili, jalapeño, tomatillo, and onion over medium-hot heat until blackened on all sides. Remove hot chiles to a paper bag and close.

2. Let sit for 5 minutes. Run chilis under water to easily peel. Remove stems and seeds.

3. Transfer grilled chilis, onion and tomatillo to a food processor or blender with the garlic, cilantro, CannaOil, and lime juice. Process on high until smooth. Season to taste with salt and pepper and set aside.

4. Brush fish with oil and season with salt and pepper on both sides.

5. Grill fish over a medium-hot heat for about 2 - 3 minutes per side, or until done to your liking or fish flakes easily with a fork.

6. Heat tortillas for about 15 seconds per side over the grill.

7. Place a layer of shredded cabbage on each tortilla, top with grilled fish, chili salsa, sliced avocado, and crumbled cheese.

8. Serve immediately.

description: So versatile it can be used on most of your favorite dishes.
title: Guacamole
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaOil

◦ 2 avocados, peeled and pitted

◦ 1 cup tomatoes, chopped

◦ ¼ cup onion, chopped

◦ ¼ cup cilantro, chopped

◦ 2 tbsp lemon juice

◦ kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

(optional) 1 jalapeno pepper, minced
directions:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl until creamy.

2. Mix tomatoes, CannaOil, onion, cilantro, lemon juice, and jalapeño pepper into mashed avocado until well combined, season with salt and black pepper.

3. Serve the cannabis-infused guacamole.

description: Pair this dish with some scrambled eggs and you will have one hell of a wake and bake.
title: Hash Browns
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter

½ lb potatoes, peeled and grated

2 eggs

salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. In a medium bowl, beat the egg and mix in salt, pepper, garlic and potatoes. 

2. Refrigerate for 60 minutes.

3. Take out the mixture and roll into balls, then set each ball aside.

4. Melt the CannaButter in a medium saucepan and fry the potato balls until golden brown.

5. Serve while hot.

description: Classic wintertime drink with a modern twist - Weed Whiskey.
title: Heady Eggnog
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup Weed Whiskey

◦ 6 eggs

◦ 3 cups heavy cream

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ 1 tbsp vanilla extract

◦ ¾ cup sugar

◦ nutmeg, to taste
directions:
1. Separate egg yolks and egg whites into two bowls.

2. Add sugar to the yolks and whisk rapidly for 2 minutes.

3. Add the heavy cream, vanilla extract and bourbon, and whisk until ingredients are distributed evenly.

4. Place the egg whites in a stand mixer and add salt. Whip mixture on high speed until stiff peaks form.

5. Gently fold stiff egg whites into the yolk mixture. Grate nutmeg into the mixture while folding.

6. Refrigerate one hour and serve with grated nutmeg on top.

description: Enjoy this creamy adult beverage by the fire, paired with a cannabis-infused doughnut.
title: Highland Latte
ingredients:
◦ 2 oz CannaScotch

◦ ½ oz Punt e Mes

◦ ½ oz Cynar

◦ 1 egg

◦ bitters
directions:
1. Separate egg whites from yolk. Pour yolk into glass. Cover and shake.

2. Add CannaScotch.

3. Add Cynar and Punt e Mes.

4. Add a dash of bitters.

5. Pour in egg whites.

6. Add ice. Cover and shake.

7. Strain into latte mug. Add a dash of bitters and swirl.

description: Golden brown Parmesan and cheddar cheese crackers. The ideal snack for those on the move.
title: Homemade Cheese Crackers
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ cups CannaFlour

◦ ½ cup cold CannaButter, cubed

◦ 1 ¼ tsp kosher salt

◦ pinch of cayenne pepper

◦ 2 cups cheddar cheese, shredded

◦ ¼ cup Parmesan cheese, grated

◦ ¼ cup cold water
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.

2. In the bowl of a food processor, pulse the CannaFlour with the salt, cayenne pepper, cheddar and Parmesan to combine. Add the CannaButter and pulse until the mixture resembles a coarse meal, 1 - 2 minutes.

3. Add the water and mix until the dough forms a ball around the blade. If the dough looks dry, add more water, 1 - 2 tbsp at a time.

4. Divide the dough into two pieces. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to ¼ inch thick. Cut into 1-inch squares and transfer to the prepared baking sheets.

5. Using the point of a small knife or the tine of a fork, poke a hole into the center of each cracker. Bake the crackers until golden brown and crisp, 14 - 16 minutes. 

6. Cool completely before serving.

(note) - The finished crackers will keep, stored in an airtight container at room temperature, for up to a week.

description: Gummies that will have you pondering the reason your did not try this sooner.
title: Homemade Gummies
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup cannabis-infused coconut oil

◦ ½ cup cold water

◦ 3 oz packet of flavored gelatin

◦ 2 tbsp plain unflavored gelatin

◦ ½ tsp sunflower lecithin
directions:
1. Turn your stove on low heat. In a pot add the water, cannabis-infused coconut oil, and sunflower lecithin.

2. Continue stirring the mixture until it has a consistent texture and the coconut oil has completely melted. Now, add in the flavored gelatin and the unflavored gelatin while continuing to stir throughout this process.

3. Whisk extensively on low heat for 10 - 15 minutes until the gelatin is completely dissolved. Make sure it does not come to a boil; make sure that all the ingredients are thoroughly combined.

(note) - Do not stop stirring this mixture for the entire 15 minutes.

4. While leaving the pot on low heat, start filling up the gummy bear molds with a dropper (a dropper is a mini turkey baster that comes with most gummy bear molds).

(note) - Make sure to move quickly. If your liquid starts to separate, it's because the mixture has started to cool. It's critical that you move fast otherwise the oil may separate in the pot. You need to continue whisking throughout the pouring process otherwise the mixture may start to harden and stop binding.

5. Put the gummy bear molds into the freezer for 20 - 25 minutes.

description: Get faded while you  satisfy your sweet tooth.
title: Homemade Hard Candy
ingredients:
◦ 3 tsp cannabis tincture

◦ 1 cup sugar

◦ ½ cup light corn syrup

◦ ¼ cup filtered water

◦ 1 tsp orange or lemon flavor
directions:
1. Combine in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat sugar, light corn syrup, and filtered water.

2. Stir until sugar is completely dissolved.

3. Once boiling, insert a candy thermometer. Do not stir after your mixture starts to boil.

4. When your thermometer reads 300°F, immediately remove from heat; keep your thermometer in the pot.

5. When the temperature drops to 250°F, stir in orange or lemon flavor, and cannabis tincture.

(note) - If orange or lemon is not your desired flavor, then replace with what you prefer.

6. Carefully pour into lollipop molds or candy molds.

7. Allow to cool completely at room temperature for about 15 - 20 minutes.

8. Store in an airtight container.

description: Cozy up to the fire with cannabis and hot chocolate.
title: Hot Chocolate
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaMilk

◦ 2 ½ cup milk

◦ ⅓ cup semisweet chocolate, graded

◦ 1 tbsp white sugar

◦ ½ tsp cinnamon, ground

◦ 6 tbsp whip cream
directions:
1. Heat CannaMilk and milk in saucepan on medium heat for 2 mins.

(note) -  Replace regular milk with CannaMilk to increase potency.

2. Mix in chocolate, sugar, and cinnamon.

3. Return to heat and cook on medium for 3 - 4 minutes or until foamy.

(note) - Do not let mixture boil.

4. Whisk until smooth and pour into 3 mugs.

(optional) - Garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon & 2 tbsp of whip cream.

description: Use this tasty dip with pita, crackers, or on sandwiches. Customize this recipe to your liking; adding chili flakes is always a good idea.
title: Hummus
ingredients:
◦ ⅓ cup CannaOil

◦ 15 oz chickpeas

◦ ¼ cup tahini

◦ ¼ cup squeezed lemon juice

◦ 2 cloves garlic

◦ ½ tsp cumin, ground

◦ 3 tbsp water

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. In a blender or food processor, combine lemon juice and tahini. Blend for 30 seconds.

2. Add chickpeas, garlic, CannaOil, cumin, and 2 tbsp of water. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

(note) - Add more water as necessary until you reach desired consistency.

3. Pour hummus mixture into a bowl and stir.

4. Serve immediately or refrigerate.

description: Great for a pick-me-up on a hot day. Cool down while you get high.
title: Iced Coffee
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaMilk

◦ ½ cup warm water

◦ 2 tsp instant coffee granules

◦ 10 ice cubes

◦ ½ can (5 oz) sweeten condensed milk

◦ 1 tbsp chocolate syrup
directions:
1. In a small bowl, stir together the water and instant coffee.

2. In a blender, combine ice cubes, coffee mixture, CannaMilk, sweetened condensed milk, and chocolate syrup. Blend until smooth.

3. Pour and enjoy!

description: A simple recipe for your next salad. Stay healthy, while still receiving your medication.
title: Italian Dressing
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaOil

◦ ⅓ cup red wine vinegar

◦ ¼ cup Romano cheese, grated

◦ ¾ tbsp sugar

◦ 1 tsp dried basil

◦ 1 tsp black pepper, ground

◦ 1 tsp dried oregano

◦ ¼ tsp garlic powder

◦ ¼ tsp red pepper flakes
directions:
1. Combine all ingredients in a mason jar.

2. Close lid tightly and shake vigorously for 15 seconds.

3. Serve immediately or store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.

(note) - Always shake before serving.

description: Spicy jalapeño peppers stuffed with a cannabis cream cheese mixture and topped with CannaButter Panko crumbs.
title: Jalapeño Poppers
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 8 oz cannabis cream cheese, room temperature

◦ 10 fresh jalapeños

◦ 8 oz Parmesan cheese, shredded

◦ 6 oz bacon

◦ 2 tbsp fresh chives, chopped

◦ 2 cloves garlic, minced

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ ½ tsp black pepper, ground

◦ 1 cup Panko
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Lightly grease a baking sheet and set aside.

2. In a small bowl, combine the Parmesan cheese, cannabis cream cheese, crumbled bacon, chives, garlic, salt, and pepper.

3. Using kitchen gloves or a plastic grocery sack to protect your hands, halve each jalapeño lengthwise. Remove seeds and membranes using a paring knife. 

4. Spoon cheese mixture evenly into each jalapeño half.

5. Melt CannaButter and pour over Panko. Toss to coat. Sprinkle evenly over each jalapeño popper. 

6. Place the peppers, cut side up, on a baking sheet and bake on the bottom rack until the cheese has melted, jalapeños have softened and Panko is golden brown. About 30 minutes.

7. Remove from the oven and serve immediately.

description: This modern twist on fried chicken will have you wishing you knew of this recipe sooner. Be careful, this recipe will leave you heavily medicated.
title: Kief Fried Chicken
ingredients:
2 grams kief or hash

1 tsp chili powder

2 cups self-rising flour

1 lb chicken breast, boneless

3 large eggs

½ cup milk

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tbsp paprika

1 tbsp chili powder

½ tsp sea salt

peanut oil (enough to fill pot half full)
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 220°F.

2. Take a baking sheet and line it with parchment paper that will not burn in the oven. Very carefully sprinkle the kief onto the sheet making sure that it is evenly disbursed.

3. Place the baking sheet into the oven uncovered and heat for 25 minutes. Pull the baking sheet from the oven, and let it cool completely.

4. Mix the decarboxylated kief with the chili powder and divide it into 8 servings with a scale.

5. In a medium bowl whisk the eggs and milk together.

6. In a different medium bowl pour in the self-rising flour, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, chili powder, and sea salt.

7. Cut the chicken breasts into 16 even strips.

8. Take your chicken strips one at a time, dredge fully into the dry mixture. Shake any excess flour off of the tender.

9. Next drop the chicken tender into the bowl of egg mixture. Pull the chicken tender out and let any extra egg drip off.

10. Then return the chicken strip back to the flour and fully cover the entire strip until evenly coated.

11. Fill a small pot up half way with peanut oil and heat to 350°F.

(note) - Keep a temperature gauge in the pot to make sure the temperature does not rise above 350°F.

12. Gently drop the chicken tenders into the hot peanut oil in for 10 minutes. Then carefully take the chicken out to let it drain.

13. Quickly sprinkle the dosed kief chili mixture over the chicken tenders while they are hot. Serve while hot and enjoy!

description: Cannabis, potatoes, and tradition. Just make sure you use Kosher Kush.
title: Latkes
ingredients:
◦ 5 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 4 cups vegetable oil

◦ 5 lb Russet potatoes, unpeeled

◦ 3 cippollini onions (or 2 regular onions)

◦ 2 large eggs, beaten

◦ ½ cup all-purpose flour

◦ 1 tsp kosher salt

◦ 1 tsp black pepper, grated
directions:
1. Using a double boiler, heat the vegetable oil until it simmers. Add the ground cannabis, and simmer for 60 minutes over low heat, stirring often.

2. Meanwhile, finely shred the potatoes. Keep the shredded potatoes from turning grey by immersing them in water. When all the potatoes have been grated and you are ready to use them, drain them thoroughly. Grate the onions and set aside.

3. Preheat oven to 250º F and place a baking sheet inside.

4. When the cannabis-infused vegetable oil is ready, strain the fiber out (with cheesecloth) and reserve the oil.

5. Drain the potatoes and press them against the colander to squeeze all the water out.

6. Mix the grated potatoes and onions in a large bowl. Add the eggs, salt and pepper. Mix well to combine. Add the flour and mix again.

(note) - You may need to add a little more flour if the mixture seems too loose.

7. Heat ½ cup of the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.

(note) - Test the oil by dropping a tsp of the latke batter into the pan; if it turns brown within one minute, then the oil is ready.

8. Make your latkes by frying one heaping tbsp of batter, until golden brown on each side.

9. Transfer the latkes on a bed of rice or couscous to help catch the excess cannabis-infused oil. 

10. After the excess oil is drained off each latkes, transfer it to the oven to keep warm on the baking sheet. Repeat this process in batches until all the latke batter is used up.

11. Reserve any remaining oil for another purpose.

12. Serve latkes with sour cream and applesauce.

description: Send out tropical vibes with this cool take on a classic cocktail.
title: Mai Tai
ingredients:
◦ 7 grams of dried cannabis

◦ 25 oz rum

◦ ½ oz orange Curaçao

◦ ⅕ oz simple syrup

◦ 1 lime

◦ ⅕ oz orgeat

◦ fresh pieces of pineapple

◦ 1 oz pineapple juice
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F and grind up cannabis.

2. Spread ground cannabis over a lined baking tray and bake for about 30 - 45 minutes.

3. After taking your cannabis out of the oven, let it cool down and put it in a large Mason jar, together with the rum. Shake it well and keep doing this every now and then while leaving it in a dark area for 5 - 7 days.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the jar, the more tasty and potent it will become.

4. Add pineapple juice, orange Curaçao, orgeat, and simple syrup to your glass of cannabis-infused rum. Fill with chunks of ice and shake or stir vigorously.

5. Serve immediately.

description: The ideal drink to enjoy on a hot summer day.
title: Mango Breeze
ingredients:
◦ 1 - 2 grams cannabis, ground

◦ ice cubes

◦ 25 oz vodka

◦ 3 cups mango chunks

◦ 2 ½ oz cranberry juice

◦ 2 ½ oz mL orange juice

◦ 1 lemon
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F.

2. Grind up cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl and cover with foil. Cover the bowl with foil and put it in the oven for 35 minutes.

3. Once the cannabis has finished decarboxylating, transfer it to a small container and pour in some vodka until the cannabis is covered and soaked. Cover the container and store it in the fridge for 24 hours (up to 7 days) to infuse the vodka.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the container, the more potent it will become.

4. Strain the cannabis-vodka mix into a blender using cheesecloth and discard the plant matter.

5. Add the mango chunks, cranberry juice, and orange juice to the blender with the crushed ice, then slice the lemon and squeeze out the juice. Blend the ingredients until smooth.

6. Serve in a glass with ice

description: Canadians are known for their maple syrup, but it has always been missing something …
title: Maple Syrup
ingredients:
◦ 3-6 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 2 cups maple syrup of choice
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Set up a double boiler by placing a heat-resistant bowl over a pot of boiling water and pour the maple syrup into the bowl to heat up until it’s at 160°F.

4. Grab the cannabis from the oven, transfer it onto a cheesecloth and tie it up into a bundle.

5. Submerge the cheesecloth bundle into the heated syrup for 1 - 2 hours then remove the syrup from the heat, squeeze out the cheesecloth and allow the CannaSyrup to cool.

description: Enjoy the intense flavor of CannaTequila in this traditional margarita.
title: Margarita
ingredients:
◦ 2 oz CannaTequila

◦ ¾ oz lime juice

◦ ¾ oz simple syrup

◦ ½ oz Grand Marnier

◦ pinch of salt
directions:
1. Shake all ingredients together.

2. Muddle.

3. Strain over ice into a collins glass and garnish with lime peel.

description: Warm flaky cannabis-infused pizza dough topped with classic tomato sauce and creamy mozzarella cheese.
title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ cups CannaFlour, sifted

◦ 2 tbsp cannabis-infused olive oil

◦ 2 tsp granulated yeast

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ 2 tsp sugar

◦ warm water

◦ 2 cups tomato sauce

◦ 12 oz mozzarella cheese

◦ oregano, to taste

◦ basil, to taste
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F.

2. Place all the dry ingredients in the bowl and mix together with your fingers. Then make a divot in the top.

3. Pour the 2 tbsp of cannabis-infused olive oil into the divot.

4. Mix in enough warm water to make a dough. There is no set amount of water, just start with a small amount and work your way up.

5. The dough is done when it easily comes away from the sides of the bowl.

(note) - If the dough is too wet, add CannaFlour and mix thoroughly until it comes away from the bowl. If it is too dry, add very small amounts of water until the desired texture is reached.

6. Put some CannaFlour on your hands and briefly knead the dough. The dough should be just a bit sticky.

7. Cover the bowl with the plate and set aside in a warm place for at least 60 minutes.

8. Lightly oil the pizza tray.

9. Turn out the dough onto the tray and press out evenly to the edges.

10. Spread tomato sauce until even all over.

11. Divide the mozzarella evenly over the sauce.

12. Add the toppings of your choice.

13. Bake the pizza for 25 - 30 minutes.

14. Once the cheese is golden brown, remove the pizza from the oven and place it on a rack to cool. Cut into slabs.

15. Serve while hot and enjoy.

description: There is nothing more refreshing on a hot summer day than an ice cold cannabis-infused mojito.
title: Mary Jane Mojito
ingredients:
2 grams cannabis, ground

2 oz white rum

½ cup club soda

2 tbsp granulated sugar

ice cubes

5 fresh mint leaves, ground

one lime
directions:
1. Mix the ground cannabis and mint together in a small glass. 

2. Squeeze a lime wedge into the mixture, add the sugar, ice, rum, club soda, and mix.

3. Garnish with a lime wedge and drink immediately.

description: Homemade cannabis-infused crust with a creamy cannabis-infused cheesecake filling, topped with sweet pomegranate sauce.
title: Mini Yogurt Cheesecakes
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 1 cup CannaSugar

◦ 18 graham crackers

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 2 tbsp unsalted butter, melted

◦ 2 cups plain Greek yogurt

◦ 8 oz cream cheese, room temperature

◦ 3 eggs

◦ 1 ¼ tsp pure vanilla extract

◦ pinch of cinnamon

◦ 1 ½ cups pomegranate seeds

(optional) 2 tbsp pomegranate molasses
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F. Lightly grease two muffin tins.

2. In the bowl of a food processor, pulse the graham crackers until they are finely ground. Transfer to a medium bowl and then wipe out the food processor's bowl.

3. Add the salt to the graham cracker crumbs and stir to combine. Add the melted CannaButter and stir until the crumbs are evenly moistened.

4. Scoop 2 tbsp of crumbs into a muffin cup and press to form an even layer in the base. Repeat with the remaining crumbs in the remaining muffin cups.

5. Bake the crust for 4 - 5 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden. Let the crust cool to room temperature.

6. Lower the oven temperature to 325°F.

7. In the bowl of the food processor, combine the yogurt with the cream cheese and CannaSugar and process until smooth, 1 - 2 minutes.

8. Add the eggs, vanilla extract, cinnamon and salt, and continue to process until the batter is smooth and combined, about 1 minute more.

9. Scoop ⅓ cup cheesecake filling onto each cooled crust. Bake until the custard is lightly golden and set at the edges but still slightly jiggly in the center, 15 - 20 minutes.

10. Cool completely and then remove the cheesecakes from the muffin tins and refrigerate until firm, at least 30 minutes. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

11. For the sauce, in a bowl, toss the pomegranate seeds with the pomegranate molasses (if using).

12. To serve, spoon 1 tbsp of the pomegranate mixture on top of each cheesecake.

description: Apple cider mixed with the sweet taste of brown sugar, cinnamon, and citrus. This cider is then spiced up with the addition of bourbon and cannabis.
title: Muggled Cider
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ oz cannabis tinture

◦ 1 cup of bourbon or brandy

◦ 6 cups apple cider

◦ ¼ cup orange juice (or pomegranate)

◦ 1 orange peel

◦ 1 tbsp brown sugar

◦ 1 cinnamon stick

◦ 1 whole clove

◦ 1 tbsp lemon juice

◦ pinch of salt
directions:
1. Add the cider, juice, spices, sugar and peel to a medium saucepan and bring to a boil.

2. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes to blend flavors.

3. Using cheesecloth, strain the cider to remove the whole spices and other leftover plant material. Add the tincture and the booze.

4. Divide into four mugs and serve immediately.

(optional) - Add additional doses of the cannabis tincture or booze deepening of individual preference.

description: Fresh mushrooms and garlic with creamy blue cheese, infused with CannaButter.
title: Mushroom & Blue Cheese Risotto
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 2 tbsp olive oil

◦ 1 ½ cups arborio rice

◦ 2 large shallots, minced

◦ 4 cloves garlic, minced

◦ 12 oz sliced mushrooms

◦ ¼ cup dry vermouth or dry white wine

◦ 3 ½ cups chicken stock

◦ ½ cup blue cheese crumbles

◦ salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Heat olive oil a large skillet over medium high heat. Add the arborio rice and stir with the oil for 1 - 2 minutes, or until toasted.

2. Add the shallot and garlic and sauté for another minute. Add the mushrooms and sauté until softened, about 3 minutes.

3. Add vermouth or white wine and stir to deglaze the pan.

4. Add 1 cup of chicken stock and stir. When most of the liquid has been absorbed, add another cup. Repeat the process cooking for about 20 minutes total.

5. Stir in CannaButter with the last of the liquid and cook until just absorbed.

6. Remove from heat, season with salt and pepper, stir in the blue cheese, and serve.

description: The iconic American dessert, so delectable you’ll want to find the entire cake.
title: New York Cheesecake
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaButter, melted

◦ 1 tbsp butter, melted

◦ 15 Graham crackers, crushed

◦ 4 packages (8oz) of cream cheese

◦ 5 cups of white sugar

◦ ¾ cup milk

◦ 4 eggs

◦ 1 cup sour cream

◦ 1 tbsp vanilla extract

◦ ¼ cup all-purpose flour
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F. Grease a 9 inch springform pan.

2. Mix Graham cracker crumbs with your melted butter and CannaButter. Press the mixture to the bottom of the springform pan.

3. In a different bowl, mix cream cheese with sugar until smooth. Blend in the milk, then mix in the eggs one at a time. Add the sour cream, vanilla, and flour, then mix until smooth. Pour the filling into the prepared crust.

4. Bake for about an 60 minutes. Turn the oven off, remove from oven, and let it cool for 5 - 6 hours to prevent cracking. Place in a refrigerator to chill.

5. Serve and enjoy!

description: Classic oatmeal cookie recipe taken to the next level. The addition of shredded coconut and chopped walnuts really turn this recipe up a notch.
title: Oats & Coconut Icebox Cookies
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaButter, softened

◦ 1 ½ cups CannaFlour

◦ ½ cup shortening

◦ 1 cup sugar

◦ 1 cup brown sugar, packed

◦ 2 large eggs

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 tsp baking soda

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ 3 cups old-fashioned oats

◦ ½ cup sweetened coconut, shredded

◦ ½ cup walnuts, chopped
directions:
1. Cream CannaButter, shortening and sugars until light and fluffy, 5 - 7 minutes. Beat in eggs and vanilla.

2. In another bowl, whisk CannaFlour, baking soda and salt; gradually beat into creamed mixture. Stir in oats, coconut and walnuts.

3. Divide dough in half. Shape each half into a 10-inch long roll. Wrap and refrigerate overnight.

4. Preheat oven to 375°F.

5. Unwrap and cut dough crosswise into ½-inch slices. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.

6. Bake until edges begin to brown, 8 - 10 minutes.

7. Cool 2 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.

description: Sweet cannabis-infused strawberry shortcake, topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberries.
title: Old-Fashioned Strawberry Shortcake
ingredients:
◦ 3 cups CannaFlour

◦ ¾ cup CannaButter

◦ 6 cups fresh strawberries, sliced

◦ 1 cup sugar

◦ 1 ½ tsp vanilla extract

◦ 3 tsp baking powder

◦ 1 tsp baking soda

◦ ½ tsp salt

◦ 1 ¼ cups buttermilk

◦ 1 ¾ cups heavy whipping cream
directions:
1. Combine strawberries with sugar and vanilla; mash slightly. Let stand at least 30 minutes, tossing occasionally.

2. Preheat oven to 400°F. Whisk together CannaFlour, 4 tbsp sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.

3. Cut in CannaButter until crumbly. Add buttermilk; stir just until combined.

4. Drop batter onto uncreased baking sheet in ⅓ cup scoops, about 2 inches apart. 

5. Brush with 2 tbsp heavy cream; sprinkle with remaining 1 tbsp sugar.

6. Bake until golden, 18 - 20 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely.

7. Beat heavy whipping cream until it begins to thicken. Add sugar and vanilla; beat until soft peaks form.

8. To serve, cut shortcakes in half; top with strawberries and whipped cream.

description: Experience the best of two American classics with this unique dish.
title: PB & J Breakfast Grits
ingredients:
¼ cup cannabis-infused coconut oil

½ cup natural crunchy peanut butter

½ cup strawberry jam

2 cups vanilla almond milk

1 cup water

1 cup grits

2 tbsp agave

½ tsp cinnamon
directions:
1. In a medium pot, whisk together the cannabis-infused coconut oil, almond milk, water, half the peanut butter, agave, and cinnamon until smooth and fully combined.

(optional) - Replace almond milk with cannabis-infused almond milk or CannaMilk.

2. Bring to a boil.

(note) - Keep a close eye on the pot when it is close to boiling.

4. Once boiling, whisk in the grits and reduce the heat to medium low. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

5. Once the grits have began to thicken up, whisk in the jam and remaining peanut butter. Remove from heat, cover, and let chill for about 5 minutes.

6. Top with remaining jam and optional bananas, agave, and cinnamon.

description: The American south has always been known for their cobbler. Pair with some CannaMilk to really get lifted.
title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaButter, melted

◦ ⅔ cup CannaMilk, room temperature

◦ 1 cup CannaFlour

◦ 1 ¼ cup granulated sugar

◦ ½ cup brown sugar

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ 1 egg

◦ peach filling

◦ 8 fresh peaches, chopped

(optional) ¼ tsp cinnamon, ground

(optional) ¼ tsp nutmeg
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.

2. Pour melted CannaButter into a 9 x 13 inch baking dish.

3. Mix CannaFlour, 1 cup of the granulated sugar, baking powder and salt together. Add CannaMilk and egg. Stir just until all dry ingredients are moistened. 

(note) - Do not over stir.

4. Pour mixture evenly over the melted CannaButter. Let sit, do not stir.

5. Combine peaches, spices, brown sugar and remaining granulated sugar into saucepan over high heat.

6. Stir constantly while waiting for the peach mixture to boil.

7. Pour the hot peaches into the baking dish evenly over the batter and melted CannaButter. Do not stir.

8. Bake for 45 minutes in preheated oven. Cobbler is ready when batter rises and is golden brown.

description: Great for pairing with some many other foods. If peanuts are not your favorite, replace them with nut of choice.
title: Peanut Butter
ingredients:
◦ 2-3 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 2 tbsp coconut oil

◦ 2 cups dry roasted peanuts

◦ 1 tbsp honey

◦ 1 tsp kosher salt
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F.

2. Grind up cannabis and put it in an ovenproof bowl with the coconut oil. Cover the bowl with foil and place it in the oven for 35 minutes.

3. Remove the bowl from the oven and using cheesecloth, strain the oil to rid it of the plant matter.

4. Add the cannabis-infused coconut oil to a food processor along with the nuts, stevia and salt. Process for 4 - 5 minutes until smooth.

5. Put your cannabis-infused peanut butter in a sealed container and store it in the fridge, or immediately spread it on a slice of bread and enjoy!

description: Liven up you CannaFudge with some nut butter. Your taste buds will thank you for the sweet and salty combo.
title: Peanut Butter CannaFudge
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaMilk

◦ 2 cups white sugar

◦ 1 cup chunky peanut butter

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

(optional) 8 oz marshmallow
directions:
1. Grease an 8 × 8 inch baking pan.

2. In a saucepan bring to a boil the sugar and CannaMilk. Let boil for 2 minutes, stirring often.

3. Remove from heat. Add the peanut butter and vanilla and mix until smooth.

4. Pour into a pan and let cool. Slice into 24 equal sized squares.

(optional) - Top fudge with marshmallows.

description: When chocolate, cannabis, and peanut butter come together, great things happen.
title: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaButter

◦ 6 tbsp cocoa powder

◦ 6 tbsp powdered sugar

◦ 4 tbsp powdered sugar, sifted

◦ ½ cup peanut butter
directions:
1. Prepare a cupcake tin with 6 liners.

2. Melt the CannaButter over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place CannaButter in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. Once the CannaButter has melted, sieve in the cocoa powder & 6 tbsp of powder sugar.

4. Stir on low heat until the ingredients have completely mixed together. Mix thoroughly until there is consistency. Turn the heat off but leave the pot on the stove.

5. In a separate bowl, stir all of the peanut butter and powdered sugar together until smooth.

6. Spread 1 tbsp of the cannabis chocolate mixture in the bottom of each cupcake liner.

7. Dollop 2 tsp of the peanut butter mixture on top of the chocolate. Cover each dollop of peanut butter with 1 more tbsp of chocolate and smooth out the top.

8. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chocolate has hardened. Remove peanut butter cups from the liners & enjoy!

description: If you are pressed for time or just do not want to bake, this is your recipe.
title: Peanut Butter No Bake Bars
ingredients:
◦ ¾ cup CannaButter, melted

◦ 2 cups graham cracker crumbs

◦ 12 oz peanut butter

◦ 2 cups powdered sugar

◦ 1 bag (12 oz) semi-sweet chocolate chips
directions:
1. Mix all ingredients, except chocolate chips. Beat until thoroughly mixed and crumbly. Press into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan.

2. Melt the chocolate chips over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate chips in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. Spread melted chocolate evenly over graham mixture. Let Stand until chocolate hardens. Cut into small squares.

4. To store, place in a sealed container.

description: Mac and Cheese that will have you coming back for more.
title: Pesto Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 3 tbsp unsalted butter

◦ 10 oz baby spinach

◦ 10 oz asparagus

◦ 5 oz cremini mushrooms

◦ 1 cup parsley

◦ 1 cup basil

◦ 1 cup Parmesan cheese, grated

◦ 1 garlic clove

◦ 3 ½ cups whole milk

◦ ⅓ cup all-purpose flour

◦ 12 oz sharp white cheddar cheese, grated

◦ kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

◦ 1 lb elbow macaroni
directions:
1. Heat the oven to broil.

2. Melt half of unsalted butter in medium saucepan over medium heat and grill asparagus till tender. Add cremini mushrooms roughly 3 minutes prior to fully cooked asparagus.

3. In a food processor, combine the spinach, parsley, basil, Parmesan, and garlic and purée until chunky. Add ½ cup milk and purée until smooth.

4. Melt the butter in another medium saucepan over medium heat; add the flour and cook 2 minutes.

5. Add remaining 3 cups milk and cook, stirring occasionally, until thick, 8 - 10 minutes.

6. Stir in half of the cheddar cheese, salt, and pepper and cook until the cheese has melted.

7. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes.

8. Drain pasta, transfer to cheese sauce along with the asparagus, cremini mushrooms, spinach and herb blend and stir well to coat.

9. Spread pasta in a 9 x 13 inch baking dish and top with remaining cheese. Transfer baking dish to a baking sheet and broil until macaroni and cheese is golden brown and bubbly, about 5 - 7 minutes.

10. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.

description: Whether on a sandwich, in a dish, or à la carte, cannabis-infused pickles are a must have for the kitchen.
title: Pickles
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaSugar 

◦ 12 cucumbers

◦ 3 garlic cloves, minced

◦ 2 tbsp mustard seeds

◦ 1 sprig fresh dill

◦ 2 cups apple cider vinegar

◦ 1 ¼ cups water

◦ 1 tbsp salt
directions:
1. Tightly pack the cucumbers into a medium sized, heat-safe glass jar (about 32 oz).

2. In a small pot, bring the vinegar, water, salt and sugar to a boil over medium-high heat.

3. Pour the brine over the cucumbers and then seal the jar.

4. Refrigerate for at least 2 days before opening.

description: A warm, sweet, and spicy adult beverage perfect for a cold rainy day.
title: Pot Buttered Rum
ingredients:
◦ 1 tbsp CannaButter

◦ ⅔ cup dark rum

◦ 3 tbsp unsalted butter

◦ ¼ cup brown sugar

◦ 1 tsp cinnamon

◦ ½ tsp nutmeg

◦ ¼ tsp cloves

◦ ⅛ tsp salt

◦ 2 cups of water
directions:
1. Bring water, CannaButter, unsalted butter, sugar, spices and salt to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat.

2. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes.

3. Remove from heat and stir in the rum.

4. Serve hot.

description: Simple and tasty puff pastries, perfect for picnics or parties.
title: Pot Pastelitos
ingredients:
3 tbsp cannabis-infused honey

1 pre-made sheet of puff pastry dough

3 tbsp favorite fruit filling

1 tbsp simple syrup
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350ºF and grease a cookie sheet.

2. Cut the puff pastry sheet into nine squares. Place about 1 tsp each of the filling and cannabis-infused honey on the middle of each square.

2. Fold square from a corner so it resembles a triangle. Press around the open edges with the end of a fork to seal each pastry.

3. Place the triangle onto a cookie sheet. Brush each pastry with simple syrup and place in the oven for 20 - 30 minutes.

description: Calm your mind and body with this relaxing adult beverage.
title: Pot Toddy
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp cannabis-infused honey

◦ 6 oz white rum

◦ 3 ½ cups water

◦ 4 bags of orange, berry or hibiscus tea

◦ 2 oz lemon juice
directions:
1. Boil the water.

2. Steep the tea bags in the water for 5 minutes.

3. Remove the tea bags and add the rum, lemon juice, cannabis-infused honey and stir to combine.

4. Divide into four mugs and serve immediately.

description: The best movie night treat, other than cannabis-infused Caramel Popcorn.
title: Potato Chips
ingredients:
◦ 2-5 grams cannabis, ground

◦ ⅔ cup coconut oil

◦ 3 tbsp salt

◦ 3 medium-sized potatoes

◦ 1 tbsp pepper

◦ 1 tbsp garlic powder
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 240°F and put your ground cannabis in an ovenproof bowl.

2. Add the coconut oil to the bowl over the cannabis and place it in the oven for 30 minutes to decarboxylate.

3. Remove the cannabis-infused coconut oil from the oven and strain using a sieve lined with cheesecloth to rid it of plant matter. Set the strained cannabis-infused coconut oil aside.

(note) - You can use melted CannaButter for this as well.

4. Fill another bowl with ice cold water and stir in salt.

5. Peel your potatoes, then slice them into paper-thin pieces using a mandoline slicer. Add the potato slices into the bowl of salty water as you cut and let them soak for 30 minutes.

6. Drain the potatoes, place the slices on paper towels and pat them to dry.

7. Put the potatoes back into the bowl and drizzle the cannabis-infused coconut oil over them, along with the pepper and garlic powder. Mix with your hands to make sure all the potato slices are covered in the oil and spices.

8. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the potato slices on it. Bake in the oven at 400°F for 15 minutes, until it’s crisp and golden brown.

9. Remove your cannabis-infused potato chips from the oven and allow to cool before serving.

description: If you enjoy pumpkin spice lattes, then these pancakes are just for you!
title: Pumpkin Spiced Pancakes
ingredients:
¼ cup coconut CannaOil

½ tbsp CannaButter

1 cup vanilla soy milk

1 tbsp lemon juice

2 tbsp agave nectar

2 bananas, very ripe

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup white whole-wheat flour

½ cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp baking powder

1 tsp baking soda

1 tsp pumpkin pie spice

¼ tsp cinnamon

½ tsp salt

½ cup walnut pieces
directions:
1. Add soy milk and lemon juice into a small bowl and whisk together until combined. Let mixture sit for about 5 minutes.

2. Meanwhile in a medium bowl add the flours, baking powder, baking soda, spices, and salt. Whisk together to fully combine. Set aside.

3. Mash the bananas in a large bowl, taking care to leave a few lumps. Add the CannaOil, agave nectar, vanilla extract, and soy milk mixture.

4. Whisk together until combined. Set aside.

5. Place a large skillet over medium heat. Slowly add the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined.

(note) - Make sure there are no dry ingredient lumps in the batter.

6. Once skillet is heated, lightly butter the skillet and ladle the pancake batter on the skillet. Cook each pancake until golden brown on each side - about 5 minutes.

(note) - Place finished pancakes in a warm oven until ready to eat.

description: A healthy alternative to other muffins with the added benefit of getting you medicated.
title: Quinoa Corn Cannabis Muffins
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaButter

1 cup quinoa, cooked

½ cup corn, grilled

1 cup whole-wheat flour

1 cup quinoa flour

¼ tsp salt

1 tsp baking soda

½ cup light brown sugar, packed

1 egg

1¼ cup plain yogurt

1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375ºF and grease muffin tin.

2. Combine whole-wheat flour, quinoa flour, salt, baking soda, and sugar in a medium mixing bowl.

(optional) - Replace whole-wheat flour with CannaFlour.

3. In another medium bowl, mix the egg, CannaButter, yogurt and vanilla.

4. Stir the wet mixture into the dry mixture, then add the cooked quinoa and corn.

5. Spoon the batter into the muffin tin and bake for about 25 minutes.

(note) - Insert a toothpick to the middle of a muffin. If the toothpick comes out mostly clean and the muffins look golden brown, then they are ready!

description: For the vegan on the go, who must also maintain their medicinal needs.
title: Raw Vegan Energy Balls
ingredients:
1 cup cannabis-infused coconut oil

⅔ cup cashews

½ sunflower seeds

½ cup dates, pitted

½ cup maple, agave or brown rice syrup

½ cup almond butter

½ cup vanilla extract

¼ tsp fine sea salt



Toppings (optional)

chia seeds

coconut flakes

rolled oats

mini chocolate chips

dried fruit

chopped nuts
directions:
1. Place a small handful of cashews in a food processor and pulse until ground. Set aside.

2. Place sunflower seeds and the remaining cashews in the food processor and pulse until coarsely ground. Add the dates and pulse until well combined with the nuts and seeds. Add the syrup, almond butter, vanilla extract and salt. Process until the mixture is smooth.

3. Once the mixture is smooth, add the cannabis-infused coconut oil and process until the mixture is smooth.

4. Form the mixture into golf-ball sized balls with your hands.

(note) - If you find the mixture to be too sticky, use the ground cashews set aside earlier and add small amounts until the mixture becomes more dough-like.

5. Roll the balls in a topping or leave plain, then place in the freezer until firm.

description: Change how you wake and bake with this amazing pancake recipe.
title: Red Velvet Pancakes
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter

1½ cup buttermilk

1 egg

1 cup all-purpose flour

⅓ cup organic cane sugar

3 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder

½ tsp baking soda

½ tsp salt

3 tbsp powdered sugar
directions:
1. In a small bowl, combine milk, egg, and butter; whisk thoroughly.

2. In another bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking soda, and salt; mix well.

3. Add liquid mixture to dry mix, and whisk together just until all of the ingredients are combined, leaving the batter slightly lumpy.

4. Heat your pan over medium heat for 60 - 90 seconds.

5. Butter the pan, then pour about ¼ cup batter for each pancake.

6. Cook for about 2 minutes or until edges set up, and the top is bubbly.

7. Carefully flip the pancake, and cook for another 1-2 minutes to cook the pancake through.

8. Repeat with rest of the batter.

9. Dust the pancakes with powdered sugar, and serve with your favorite syrups and toppings.

description: Become a grilling legend with this succulent and spicy steak recipe.
title: Ribeye with Chimichurri Sauce
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp CannaButter

(optional) 8 cannabis fan leaves, chopped

◦ 4 cups parsley, chopped

◦ ½ cup fresh garlic, chopped

◦ 1 tsp red chili flakes

◦ 2 tsp dried oregano

◦ 1 tbsp red wine vinegar

◦ 2 cups canola or other neutral oil

◦ 2 cups olive oil

◦ 2 bone - in ribeye steaks

◦ kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

◦ ¾ cup olive oil
directions:
1. In a large bowl mix parsley, garlic, red chili flakes, oregano, red wine vinegar, salt, and oils.

(optional) - Add diced cannabis leaves to mixture.

2. Rub the steaks with generous amount of salt and pepper. Let rest in fridge uncovered for 10 hours or overnight. Take out of fridge 2 hours before cooking and allow to come to room temp.

3. In a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, warm the remaining ¾ olive oil. Working with one ribeye at a time, cook, flipping once, until well browned and cooked to desired doneness.

(note) - The timing will depend on the thickness of the steak.

4. Transfer ribeye to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes. Repeat with remaining steak.

5. Cut steaks against the grain into slices about ½ inch thick and transfer to individual plates. Serve topped with CannaButter and accompanied by the chimichurri sauce.

description: A cannabis-infused milkshake with peanut butter and chocolate … could it get any better?
title: Salted Peanut Butter Cup Milkshake
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaMilk

◦ 1 tbsp cannabis-infused peanut butter

◦ ½ frozen banana

◦ 1 tbsp cocoa powder

◦ ½ cup ice

◦ 1 scoop vanilla whey protein powder

◦ sea salt, garnish
directions:
1. Blend all ingredients except the sea salt until smooth.

2. To serve, pour in a large glass and sprinkle with a pinch of sea salt.

description: Spice up your seafood recipe with this cannabis-infused curry dish.
title: Shellfish Curry
ingredients:
◦ 2 tbsp cannabis-infused coconut oil

◦ 12 oz crab or lobster meat

◦ 1 tsp Jamaican curry powder

◦ 1 garlic clove, minced

◦ 1 tsp onion, granulated

◦ pinch cayenne pepper

◦ ½ cup coconut milk

◦ ¼ cup chicken broth

◦ salt, to taste
directions:
1. Melt the cannabis-infused coconut oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

2. Add the crab or lobster and cook slightly, 2 minutes.

3. Stir in the curry powder and garlic, then add the granulated onion, and cayenne.

4. Stir in the coconut milk and chicken broth and reduce slightly, about 3 minutes.

5. Season to taste with salt and serve.

description: Fluffy cornbread mixed with savory spices and infused with cannabis.
title: Skillet Herb Bread
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ cups CannaFlour

◦ 2 tbsp CannaSugar

◦ 4 tsp baking powder

◦ 1 ½ tsp salt

◦ 1 tsp rubbed sage

◦ 1 tsp dried thyme

◦ 1 ½ cups yellow cornmeal

◦ 1 ½ cups celery, chopped

◦ 1 cup onion, chopped

◦ 2 oz pimientos, chopped

◦ 3 large eggs

◦ 1 ½ cups milk

◦ ⅓ cup vegetable oil
directions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the CannaFlour, CannaSugar, baking powder, salt, sage and thyme.

2. Combine cornmeal, celery, onion and pimientos. Add mixture to dry ingredients and mix well.

3. Add eggs, milk and oil; stir just until moistened.

4. Pour into a greased 10-inch ovenproof skillet. Bake at 400°F for 35 - 45 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

5. Serve warm.

description: A classic too good to pass up. Enjoy the distinct flavors only sardines can deliver, while basking in the feeling only cannabis can give you.
title: Spicy Sardine Spaghetti
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp cannabis-infused olive oil

◦ 5 garlic cloves, minced

◦ ½ head fennel, diced, fronds reserved for garnish

◦ 1 (4oz) can sardines

◦ 1 tsp chili flakes

◦ ¼ cup white wine

◦ 1 (15oz) can whole peeled tomatoes, crushed

◦ 1 lb spaghetti

◦ kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

◦ 8 oz cannabis-infused or regular Ricotta cheese
directions:
1. Heat 3 tbsp cannabis-infused olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low.

2. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Add the fennel and sardines and cook until the fennel is soft, 4 minutes. Add the chili flakes and cook 1 minute more.

3. Add the white wine and cook until reduced slightly, 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and cook until slightly thick, 3 - 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and keep warm.

4. Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes.

5. Drain, reserving ½ cup pasta water. Toss the pasta in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.

(note) - Add a bit of cooking liquid if needed to thin it out slightly.

6. Divide among bowls and top each with a dollop of ricotta. Drizzle with cannabis-infused olive oil to serve and garnish with the fennel fronds.

description: A delicious vegetarian meal and healthy way to ingest your medicine.
title: Spinach Cannabis Quiche
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter

3 cloves garlic, minced

1 small white onion, diced

10 oz spinach

5 oz mushrooms, chopped

6 oz crumbled feta

1 cup cheddar cheese, shredded

4 eggs, beaten

1 cup milk

1 (9-inch) unbaked deep pie crust

salt and black pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375ºF.

2. In a medium size skillet melt CannaButter over medium-heat. Add the garlic and onion to the skillet, cook for 5 - 6 minutes.

3. After about 5 minutes, add the mushrooms and spinach. Now add the feta cheese and ½ cup of shredded cheddar cheese.

4. Season with salt and black pepper. Stir well to combine until all of the cheese is mostly melted.

5. Spoon the quiche mixture into the unbaked pie crust.

6. In a medium bowl, beat the 4 eggs and 1 cup of milk. Pour egg mixture over the top of the spinach filling in the pie crust.

(note) - Jiggle the pie crust around to ensure that the quiche has no air bubbles.

7. Bake the quiche in the oven for 15 minutes. Remove the quiche from the oven and top it with the remaining ½ cup of cheddar cheese.

8. Bake the quiche for an additional 35 - 40 minutes.

(note) - Make sure the center of the quiche is completely set.

9. Remove the quiche from the oven and allow it to stand for 10 minutes.

description: Savor the sweet taste of strawberries with every bite. This cobbler with leave you highly satisfied.
title: Strawberry Cobbler
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaButter, softened

◦ 40 oz strawberries, sliced

◦ 2 cups all-purpose flour

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ ½ cup light brown sugar

◦ 2 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside when evenly combined.

2. In a large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.

3. Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.

4. In a 9 x 13 inch baking pan, layer strawberries berries. Add crumbled dough evenly across fruit.

5. Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

description: For those who like fruity alcoholic beverages, but still want to get lifted. Get the best of both worlds with every sip.
title: Strawberry Gin Smash
ingredients:
◦ 2 grams cannabis, ground

◦ ½ tsp granulated sugar

◦ 1 lime wedge

◦ 3 fresh strawberries (2 hulled and sliced and 1 reserved for garnish)

◦ 3 oz gin

◦ club soda

◦ fresh mint sprig, for garnish
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F. Grind up cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl and cover with foil.

2. Place the bowl in the oven for 30 minutes then remove and transfer the baked cannabis to mason jar.

3. Pour some gin into the jar until the cannabis is covered and soaked, seal the jar and shake for 60 seconds.

4. Fill a crock-pot with water until about ¼ full, set it on low and place the jar in the crock-pot. Allow the cannabis-gin mixture to infuse in the crock-pot for 8 hours

(note) - Open the jar every hour to release pressure.

5. Next, line a funnel with cheesecloth and place it over a blender. Remove the cannabis-infused gin jar from the crock-pot and poor contents through the funnel into the blender.

6. Add a cup of ice cold water, strawberries, lemon juice, sugar, and salt to the blender. Blend until smooth, serve in a glass with a kiwi wedge and enjoy!

description: Step up your peanut butter and jelly game with this tasty classic.
title: Strawberry Jam
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaSugar

◦ 2 lb strawberries, hulled

◦ 3 cups white sugar

◦ ¼ cup lemon juice
directions:
1. In a wide bowl, crush strawberries in batches until you have 4 cups of mashed berry. 

2. In a large saucepan, mix together the strawberries, sugar, CannaSugar, and lemon juice.

3. Process in a water bath. 

(note) - If the jam is not going to be eaten right away, don't bother with processing, and just refrigerate.

4. Stir over low heat until the sugar is dissolved. Increase heat to high and bring the mixture to a full rolling boil. Boil, stirring often, until the mixture reaches 220°F. Transfer to hot sterile jars, leaving ¼ - ½ inch headspace, and seal.

5. Stir before serving.

description: Show you local diner how to make a proper milkshake with this innovative twist.
title: Strawberry Milkshake
ingredients:
◦ 1 ½ cup CannaMilk

◦ 4-7 grams cannabis, ground

◦ 1 can (13.6 oz) coconut milk

◦ 2 cups milk

◦ 12 oz strawberry ice cream

◦ 2 frozen bananas

◦ 1 cup frozen strawberries

◦ 3 tbsp maple syrup

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 245°F and line a baking sheet with foil.

2. Grind your cannabis onto the baking sheet and bake it for 20 - 25 minutes.

3. After the cannabis is done baking, remove it from the oven and set it aside.

4. Put a saucepan on the stove over medium heat, pour in 2 cups of milk, add in the cannabis and let it simmer for 40 minutes while whisking occasionally.

(note)- Be careful not to boil as it will degrade the potency of your cannabis mixture.

5. Strain the CannaMilk into a jar using a colander lined with cheesecloth. Discard the plant matter and store in the fridge to cool.

6. Add the coconut milk, CannaMilk, ice cream, bananas, strawberries, maple syrup and vanilla, and blend until smooth.

7. Pour your milkshake into a mason jar and store in the fridge for several hours until it’s chilled and creamy.

description: A sweet, healthy alternative to other salad dressings. This dressing is infused with cannabis coconut oil.
title: Strawberry Vinaigrette
ingredients:
◦ ¾ cup cannabis-infused coconut oil

◦ 3 tbsp strawberry puree

◦ 3 tbsp white balsamic vinegar

◦ 1 ½ tbsp honey

◦ ¼ tsp black pepper, ground
directions:
1. In a small container, add the strawberry puree, white balsamic vinegar, honey, and black pepper. Blend with an immersion blender.

2. While the blender continues to run, slowly drizzle in the cannabis-infused coconut oil until well incorporated.

3. Set aside or store in refrigerator.

description: Fresh arugula tossed with strawberries, slivered almonds, burrata cheese, and cannabis-infused strawberry vinaigrette.
title: Strawberry Vinaigrette with Burrata Salad
ingredients:
◦ ¾ cup cannabis-infused coconut oil

◦ 3 tbsp strawberry puree

◦ 3 tbsp white balsamic vinegar

◦ 1 ½ tbsp honey

◦ ¼ tsp black pepper, ground

◦ 6 cups arugula, packed

◦ 1 cup strawberries, sliced

◦ ¼ cup almonds, slivered and toasted

◦ 4 balls burrata cheese, 4 oz each
directions:
1. Evenly divide the arugula, strawberries, and almonds amongst 4 large salad bowls.

2. Top each salad with a burrata cheese ball.

3. In a small container, add the strawberry puree, white balsamic vinegar, honey, and black pepper. Blend with an immersion blender.

4. While the blender continues to run, slowly drizzle in the cannabis-infused coconut oil until well incorporated.

5. Drizzle 2 ½ oz of the Infused Strawberry Vinaigrette per salad.

6. Toss if desired, top with freshly ground black pepper, and enjoy. 

7. Serve immediately.

description: You can’t go wrong with cobbler. This is the perfect dish for you next summer party.
title: Summer Berry Cobbler
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaButter, softened

◦ 16 oz strawberries, sliced

◦ 12 oz blackberries

◦ 6 oz raspberries

◦ 6 oz blueberries

◦ 2 cups all-purpose flour

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ 1 tsp salt

◦ ½ cup light brown sugar

◦ 2 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside when evenly combined.

2. In a large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.

3. Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.

4. In a 9 × 13 inch baking pan, layer mixed berries. Add crumbled dough evenly across fruit.

5. Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

description: For the vegans or any other healthy individuals who want to also enjoy their cannabis.
title: Super Green Smoothie
ingredients:
◦ 2 tsp cannabis-infused coconut oil

◦ 1 cup almond milk (or CannaMilk)

◦ 2 cups spinach

◦ 1 tbsp almond butter

◦ 1 banana

◦ 1 tbsp protein powder

◦ 1 cup ice
directions:
1. Place all ingredients inside blender / food processor.

2. Blend until thick and smooth consistency is reached.

3. Serve immediately.

description: Abide to the recipe prescribed by the Dude. Enjoy the creamy coffee flavor of this cannabis-infused cocktail.
title: The Dude Abides
ingredients:
◦ ½ cup CannaCream

◦ ½ cup Kahlua

◦ ¼ cup vodka

◦ 2 ½ cups fresh brewed coffee
directions:
1. In a medium saucepan, stir together the coffee, CannaCream, Kahula and vodka over medium heat until thoroughly warmed.

2. Divide among four mugs and serve immediately.

description: Looking for a quick and easy treat? These no bake cookies will be your best friend.
title: Toffee No Bake Cookies
ingredients:
◦ 2 ½ tbsp CannaButter

◦ 3 cups quick-cooking oats

◦ 1 cup peanut butter

◦ ½ cup bittersweet chocolate chips

◦ ½ cup semisweet chocolate chips

◦ ½ cup toffee bits

◦ ½ tsp kosher salt
directions:
1. Line a baking sheet with wax paper.

2. Combine the oats, peanut butter, chocolate chips, toffee bits, CannaButter and salt in a medium saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until the chocolate chips melt.

3. Scoop large spoonfuls of batter onto the baking sheet and sprinkle each cookie with extra toffee bits.

4. Freeze for 15 minutes before serving.

(note) - The cookies can be stored in the refrigerator in an air-tight container for 1 week.

5. Serve the once cookies have cooled

description: Take a bite into the Old West with this cowboy favorite. Pairs great with wedge cut potatoes and a tall beer.
title: Tomahawk Rib Eye
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter

1 bone-in, cowboy-cut rib eye (18 oz)

2 tbsp canola oil

½ cup fresh parsley, minced

1½ tsp sea salt

1 tsp fresh black pepper, coarsely ground

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder
directions:
1. First, the garlic herb CannaButter must be created. In a food processor, bring 1 cup CannaButter to room temperature and blend in the parsley, sea salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.

2. Once the butter is thoroughly blended, transfer it to a piece of parchment paper or plastic wrap. Roll the butter into a log and wrap it tightly.

3. Put it in a freezer zip-top bag before storing it in the fridge or freezer.

4. Put a 12 - inch cast - iron skillet in the oven and preheat the oven to 500° F.

5. Rub the steak with the canola oil and season it generously with salt and pepper.

6. Wearing an oven mitt, carefully remove the hot skillet from the oven and put it on the stove over high heat.Put the steak in the pan and sear it for 1 minute, then turn it and sear on the other side for 1 minute.Flip the steak and carefully return the pan to the oven.

7. Cook the steak for 3 minutes, flip it and cook for an additional 3 minutes, or until an instant - read thermometer reads 140°F.Remove it from the oven and let it rest, tented with aluminum foil, for 10 minutes.

8. Slice meat off the bone and cut into thick slices.Top with your homemade garlic herb CannaButter.

description: One of CannaBook’s most popular recipes. Enjoy this classic ice cream recipe as is, or change things up by adding your favorite ingredients.
title: Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients:
◦ 4 tbsp CannaButter

◦ 2 cups whipping cream

◦ 1 Can (14 oz) condensed milk

◦ ½ tsp vanilla extract

◦ ¼ cup mint, chopped

(optional) favorite ingredients (chocolate chips, sprinkles, etc …)
directions:
1. Whip the cream till stiff.

2. Add all remaining ingredients in a separate bowl and mix. Now fold the mixture with the whipping cream. 

3. Store in a container and freeze for 6 hours.

4. Serve while cold.

description: Vegan cannabis-infused batter mixed with banana and chopped walnuts, topped with walnuts.
title: Vegan Banana Bread
ingredients:
◦ 1 cup CannaSugar

◦ 3 ripe bananas

◦ 2 flax eggs

◦ ½ cup butter, dairy free

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 2 cups all-purpose flour

◦ 1 tsp baking powder

◦ ½ tsp baking soda

◦ ½ tsp cinnamon

◦ ¼ tsp salt

◦ ¾ cup walnuts, chopped
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. Start by making the flax eggs: stir flaxseed meal and water together then set aside for 5 - 10 minutes or until the flaxseed has absorbed the water.

3. Next, use a fork to mash the bananas into the bottom of a bowl.

4. In a separate bowl, cream butter and CannaSugar together. Next, add the bananas, vanilla and flax eggs.

5. Add the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt to the same bowl and stir to combine, then stir in ½ cup chopped walnuts.

6. Grease a bread pan with coconut oil, then pour batter into the pan. Sprinkle the remaining ¼ cup chopped walnuts evenly on top of the batter.

7. Bake bread for 50 - 55 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

8. Wait 10 minutes before running a knife along the edges, then carefully inverting the bread onto a cooling rack.

9. Wait until bread cools completely before slicing.

description: Enjoy this vegan dish packed with flavor. Pairs great with a salad and your favorite berry juice.
title: Vegan Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients:
1 tbsp cannabis-infused coconut or olive oil

6 cups spiral pasta, cooked

2½ cups vegan cheese shreds

2 tbsp vegan butter

2½ tsp yellow mustard

½ tsp kosher salt

1 tsp garlic salt

1 tbsp garlic, diced

¾ cup almond milk, unsweetened

2 tbsp nutritional yeast

3 cups jackfruits, chunked

1 cup barbecue sauce

2 tsp olive oil

salt and pepper, to taste

(optional) hot sauce

(optional) 1 scallion, chopped

(optional) ½ cup cilantro, loosely packed
directions:
1. Heat a large pot on low heat. Add butter and chopped garlic. As the butter is melting, whisk in the nutritional yeast, garlic powder and salt. Incorporate the dry ingredients with the butter, then quickly add in a few tablespoons of almond milk. Alternate mixing in small amounts of vegan cheese and almond milk, until it is all blended together into a sauce, then mix in the mustard.

2. Once you have mixed the mustard thoroughly into the sauce, switch to using a rubber spatula and mix in the cooked pasta, cannabis-infused oil and pasta water, mixing to coat.

(note) - It is fine if you still have some unmelted vegan cheese shreds. This is due to some vegan cheeses not melting quickly.

3. Salt and pepper to taste. If your pasta is too runny, add more nutritional yeast.

4. If you want to dose the whole batch with THC, you can add in the cannabis oil at this point and mix it thoroughly. Or you can let your guests add a drizzle on top of their plates individually.

5. Cover the pot and remove from heat. Put it aside.

6. Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet on medium-high. Once hot, toss in the  jackfruit. Cook until any excess moisture is cooked out and the edges get crispy. Add salt and pepper to taste, then remove from heat.

7. Mix together the jackfruit and the barbecue sauce. Place the skillet under the broiler, handle out, on high. Keep a close eye on your pan and make sure nothing burns.

8. To serve, scoop in a half-cup of macaroni, then add a few tablespoons of jackfruit.

(optional) - Add hot sauce if desired and top with scallions and cilantro.

description: These cannabis-infused oatmeal cookies go great with some cannabis-infused coffee or almond milk.
title: Vegan Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
◦ 3 tbsp cannabis-infused coconut oil

◦ 3 tbsp CannaFlour

◦ ½ cup maple syrup

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ ½ cup oat flour

◦ ¾ tsp baking soda

◦ ½ tsp sea salt

◦ ¾ cup rolled oats

◦ 4 oz vegan bittersweet chocolate, chopped
directions:
1. Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat to 375ºF. Line two large cookie sheets with parchment paper.

2. In a large bowl, whisk together the maple syrup, cannabis-infused coconut oil, and vanilla extract until smooth and combined.

3. Sift in the oat flour, CannaFlour, baking soda, and salt, then stir to combine. Stir in the oats and chopped chocolate.

4. Scoop 1-inch diameter balls of dough (about 3 tbsp) onto the prepared baking sheets, spaced 2 - 3 inches apart. Top each cookie with a chunk or two of chocolate and a tiny pinch of flaky salt.

5. Bake the trays one at a time, rotating halfway through for even baking, 8 - 10 minutes.

6. Slide the cookies, parchment and all, off of the cookie sheet and onto the cooling rack to stop the baking.

7. Repeat with the remaining cookies.

(note) - The finished cookies will keep stored in an airtight container for up to 3 days.

description: Perfect for a hot day! Enjoy these amazing popsicles throughout this hot summer. Stay cool while you medicate.
title: Very Berry Frozen Cheesecake Pops
ingredients:
½ gram kief or hash, decarboxylated

4 oz cream cheese

¾ cup plain yogurt

¼ cup agave nectar

1 tsp lemon or lime juice

¾ cup raspberries

¾ cup blue berries
directions:
1. In a medium mixing bowl, use an electric mixer to beat cream cheese until light and fluffy. Lower mixer speed and mix in yogurt, agave syrup, and lemon or lime juice, and kief until thoroughly combined.

2. Turn off mixer and use a rubber spatula to fold the berries into the mixture. Divide mixture among ice pop molds and freeze.

3. When ready to eat, run hot water over the mold for about 10 seconds, the popsicles should easily pull right out the mold.

description: Enjoy this cannabis-infusion in cocktails or take shots. Just be careful, this infusion will creep up on you.
title: Weed Whiskey
ingredients:
◦ 750 mL bottle Bourbon Whiskey

◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 240ºF.

2. Decarboxylate your cannabis by spreading it evenly across a cookie sheet. Place aluminum foil over the top of the cannabis.

(note) - Break your cannabis up in to relatively small chucks to help the decarboxylation process.

3. Place tray into the oven for 25 - 45 minutes. Take it out and let it cool.

4. Grind the cannabis and wrap it in cheesecloth.

5. Place the cheesecloth package in a 1 L sealable jar, then add the whiskey.

6. Shake the bottle and let it sit, in the dark, for at least 48 hours. Shake it up at least once a day until it has reached your desired potency—up to one month, if possible.

(note) - The longer it sits, the more potent it will be.

7. Pour the whiskey mixture into a glass container, using a cheesecloth to strain out any ground cannabis from the whiskey.

(note) - Discard the plant material.

8. Store in 1 L sealable jar.

description: Light, airy, cannabis-infused whipped cream with hints of vanilla.
title: Whipped CannaCream
ingredients:
◦ ¼ oz cannabis, ground

◦ 1 cup heavy cream

◦ 1 tsp vanilla extract

◦ 1 tbsp powdered sugar
directions:
1. Heat heavy cream and ground cannabis in double boiler over medium heat.

2. Simmer for at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally.

3. Remove the boiler from the heat and let the mixture cool.

4. Prepare a storage container by taking 2 sheets of the cheese cloth and securing it over the lid of the container.

5. Pour the cream slowly over the top of the cheesecloth and into the container.

6. After a few minutes pour the cream into an airtight container and store in the refrigerator until cold.

7. Pour the cold cream into a large bowl.

(note) - Whip the cream until it is thick enough for your tastes.

8. Beat in the vanilla extract and sugar gently.

(note) - Over-beating will result in lumpy whipped cream.

9. Serve and enjoy. Keep refrigerated.

description: Fluffy loaves of cannabis-infused bread with sweet honey and flaxseed, topped with flaxseed and toasted wheat germ.
title: Wild Rice Bread with Sunflower Seeds
ingredients:
◦ 3 cups CannaFlour

◦ ¼ cup CannaButter, softened

◦ 3 cups whole wheat flour

◦ ½ oz active dry yeast

◦ 1 cup warm water (110º - 115ºF)

◦ ⅓ cup honey or molasses

◦ 2 tbsp flaxseed, ground

◦ 2 tsp salt

◦ 1 large egg white, lightly beaten

(optional) 1 tbsp toasted wheat germ
directions:
1. In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.

2. In a large bowl, combine rice, 1 cup sunflower kernels, milk, honey, CannaButter, flaxseed, salt, yeast mixture, whole wheat flour and 1 cup CannaFlour; beat on medium speed until combined. Stir in enough remaining flour to form a stiff dough (dough will be sticky).

3. Turn dough onto a floured surface; knead until elastic, 6 - 8 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease the top. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 75 minutes.

4. Punch down dough. Turn onto a lightly floured surface; divide in half. Roll each half into a 12 x 8 inch rectangle.

5. Roll up jelly-roll style, starting with a short side; pinch seam and ends to seal. Place each in a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan coated with cooking spray, seam side down.

6. Cover with kitchen towels; let rise in a warm place until almost doubled, about 45 minutes. Preheat oven to 375°F.

Brush loaves with egg white; sprinkle with remaining sunflower kernels.

(optional) - Sprinkle wheat germ if desired.

Bake 35 - 45 minutes or until dark golden brown. Cool in pans 5 minutes. Remove to a wire rack to cool.
